                                                col('YearLevel').alias('xYearLevel')
                                                ).filter((col('TestLevel') == "Pre") & (col('QuestionType') == "Literacy")) \
                                                .withColumn('PreTestLiteracyComplete', lit("1"))


PostTestNumeracy_df = EarlyYearsResultsYear2_df.select(col('Year').alias('xYear'), 
                                                col('CampusID').alias('xCampusID'), 
                                                col('Ceider').alias('xCeider'), 
                                                col('ClassID').alias('xClassID'), 
                                                col('YearLevel').alias('xYearLevel')
                                                ).filter((col('TestLevel') == "Post") & (col('QuestionType') == "Numeracy")) \
                                                .withColumn('PostTestNumeracyComplete', lit("1"))


PostTestLiteracy_df = EarlyYearsResultsYear2_df.select(col('Year').alias('xYear'), 
                                                col('CampusID').alias('xCampusID'), 
                                                col('Ceider').alias('xCeider'), 
                                                col('ClassID').alias('xClassID'), 
                                                col('YearLevel').alias('xYearLevel')
                                                ).filter((col('TestLevel') == "Post") & (col('QuestionType') == "Literacy")) \
                                                .withColumn('PostTestLiteracyComplete', lit("1"))


if (not PreTestNumeracy_df.rdd.isEmpty()):
    EarlyYearsTestCompletion2_df = EarlyYearsStudents_Y2_df.join(PreTestNumeracy_df, 
                                                            [col('Year') == col('xYear'),
                                                            col('CampusID') == col('xCampusID'),
                                                            col('Ceider') == col('xCeider'),
                                                            col('ClassID') == col('xClassID'),
                                                            col('YearLevel') == col('xYearLevel')],
                                                            how="left"
                                                            )

    EarlyYearsTestCompletion2_df = EarlyYearsTestCompletion2_df.drop('xYear', 'xCampusID', 'xCeider', 'xClassID', 'xYearLevel')

else:
    #if the pre tests are completely empty then assign false to pre test completion for every student 
    EarlyYearsTestCompletion2_df = EarlyYearsStudents_Y2_df.withColumn("PreTestNumeracyComplete", lit("0"))


if (not PreTestLiteracy_df.rdd.isEmpty()):
    EarlyYearsTestCompletion2_df = EarlyYearsTestCompletion2_df.join(PreTestLiteracy_df, 
                                                                    [col('Year') == col('xYear'),
                                                                    col('CampusID') == col('xCampusID'),
                                                                    col('Ceider') == col('xCeider'),
                                                                    col('ClassID') == col('xClassID'),
                                                                    col('YearLevel') == col('xYearLevel')],
                                                                    how="left"
                                                                    )
                                                            
    EarlyYearsTestCompletion2_df = EarlyYearsTestCompletion2_df.drop('xYear', 'xCampusID', 'xCeider', 'xClassID', 'xYearLevel')

else:
    #if the pre tests are completely empty then assign false to pre test completion for every student 
    EarlyYearsTestCompletion2_df = EarlyYearsTestCompletion2_df.withColumn("PreTestLiteracyComplete", lit("0"))


if (not PostTestNumeracy_df.rdd.isEmpty()):
    EarlyYearsTestCompletion2_df = EarlyYearsTestCompletion2_df.join(PostTestNumeracy_df, 
                                                                    [col('Year') == col('xYear'),
                                                                    col('CampusID') == col('xCampusID'),
                                                                    col('Ceider') == col('xCeider'),
                                                                    col('ClassID') == col('xClassID'),
                                                                    col('YearLevel') == col('xYearLevel')],
                                                                    how="left"
                                                                    )
                                                            
    EarlyYearsTestCompletion2_df = EarlyYearsTestCompletion2_df.drop('xYear', 'xCampusID', 'xCeider', 'xClassID', 'xYearLevel')

else:
    #if the Post tests are completely empty then assign false to Post test completion for every student 
    EarlyYearsTestCompletion2_df = EarlyYearsTestCompletion2_df.withColumn("PostTestNumeracyComplete", lit("0"))



if (not PostTestLiteracy_df.rdd.isEmpty()):
    EarlyYearsTestCompletion2_df = EarlyYearsTestCompletion2_df.join(PostTestLiteracy_df, 
                                                                    [col('Year') == col('xYear'),
                                                                    col('CampusID') == col('xCampusID'),
                                                                    col('Ceider') == col('xCeider'),
                                                                    col('ClassID') == col('xClassID'),
                                                                    col('YearLevel') == col('xYearLevel')],
                                                                    how="left"
                                                                    )
                                                            
    EarlyYearsTestCompletion2_df = EarlyYearsTestCompletion2_df.drop('xYear', 'xCampusID', 'xCeider', 'xClassID', 'xYearLevel')

else:
    #if the Post tests are completely empty then assign false to Post test completion for every student 
    EarlyYearsTestCompletion2_df = EarlyYearsTestCompletion2_df.withColumn("PostTestLiteracyComplete", lit("0"))


EarlyYearsTestCompletion2_df = EarlyYearsTestCompletion2_df.withColumn('PreTestComplete', when( ((col('PreTestNumeracyComplete') == "1") & 
                                                                                                    (col('PreTestLiteracyComplete') == "1")), lit("1")).otherwise(lit("0")) 
                                                                                                
                                                                        )

EarlyYearsTestCompletion2_df = EarlyYearsTestCompletion2_df.withColumn('PostTestComplete', when( ((col('PostTestNumeracyComplete') == "1") & 
                                                                                                    (col('PostTestLiteracyComplete') == "1")), lit("1")).otherwise(lit("0")) 
                                                                                                
                                                                        )

# sort the columns
EarlyYearsTestCompletion2_df = EarlyYearsTestCompletion2_df.select(sorted(EarlyYearsTestCompletion2_df.columns))
# combine the prep/year1 test completion table with the year 2 table
EarlyYearsTestCompletion_df = EarlyYearsTestCompletion_df.union(EarlyYearsTestCompletion2_df)
### Create Results Totals tables (Prep and Year 1)

# Create the early years transformations for aggregate pre/post test results

EarlyYearsResultsTotals_df = EarlyYearsResults_df.groupBy("CampusID", "Ceider",	"ClassID", "Year", "YearLevel", "TestLevel").agg(sum(EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques1+
                                                                                                                EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques2+
                                                                                                                EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques3+
                                                                                                                EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques4+
                                                                                                                EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques5+
                                                                                                                EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques6+
                                                                                                                EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques7+
                                                                                                                EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques8+
                                                                                                                EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques9+
                                                                                                                EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques10+
                                                                                                                EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques11+
                                                                                                                EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques12+
                                                                                                                EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques13+
                                                                                                                EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques14+
                                                                                                                EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques15+
                                                                                                                EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques16+
                                                                                                                EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques17+
                                                                                                                EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques18+
                                                                                                                EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques19+
                                                                                                                EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques20).alias("NumeracyTotal"), 
                                                                                                                sum(EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques21+
                                                                                                                EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques22+
                                                                                                                EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques23+
                                                                                                                EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques24+
                                                                                                                EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques25+
                                                                                                                EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques26+
                                                                                                                EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques27+
                                                                                                                EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques28+
                                                                                                                EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques29+
                                                                                                                EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques30+
                                                                                                                EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques31+
                                                                                                                EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques32+
                                                                                                                EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques33+
                                                                                                                EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques34+
                                                                                                                EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques35+
                                                                                                                EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques36+
                                                                                                                EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques37+
                                                                                                                EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques38+
                                                                                                                EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques39+
                                                                                                                EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques40).alias("LiteracyTotal"))

# add the percent rank based on year, yearlevel, testlevel and numeracy/literacy groups

EarlyYearsResults_Numeracy_df = EarlyYearsResultsTotals_df.select("CampusID", 
                                                                    "Ceider", 
                                                                    "ClassID", 
                                                                    "Year", 
                                                                    "YearLevel", 
                                                                    "TestLevel", 
                                                                    "NumeracyTotal", 
                                                                    "LiteracyTotal",
                                                                    percent_rank().over(Window.partitionBy(EarlyYearsResultsTotals_df['Year'],
                                                                                                            EarlyYearsResultsTotals_df['YearLevel'],
                                                                                                            EarlyYearsResultsTotals_df['TestLevel'])\
                                                                                                            .orderBy(EarlyYearsResultsTotals_df['NumeracyTotal'])).alias("NumeracyPercentile")
                                                                    
                                                                )


EarlyYearsResults_Literacy_df = EarlyYearsResultsTotals_df.select(col("CampusID").alias('xCampusID'), 
                                                                    col("Ceider").alias('xCeider'), 
                                                                    col("ClassID").alias('xClassID'), 
                                                                    col("Year").alias('xYear'), 
                                                                    col("YearLevel").alias('xYearLevel'), 
                                                                    col("TestLevel").alias('xTestLevel'), 
                                                                    percent_rank().over(Window.partitionBy(EarlyYearsResultsTotals_df['Year'],
                                                                                                            EarlyYearsResultsTotals_df['YearLevel'],
                                                                                                            EarlyYearsResultsTotals_df['TestLevel'])\
                                                                                                            .orderBy(EarlyYearsResultsTotals_df['LiteracyTotal'])).alias("LiteracyPercentile")
                                                                    
                                                                )


EarlyYearsResults_Percentile_df = EarlyYearsResults_Numeracy_df.join(EarlyYearsResults_Literacy_df, 
                                                                    [col('Year') == col('xYear'),
                                                                    col('CampusID') == col('xCampusID'),
                                                                    col('Ceider') == col('xCeider'),
                                                                    col('ClassID') == col('xClassID'),
                                                                    col('YearLevel') == col('xYearLevel'),
                                                                    col('TestLevel') == col('xTestLevel')],
                                                                    how="outer"
                                                                    )

# merge the values into single column
EarlyYearsResults_Percentile_df = EarlyYearsResults_Percentile_df.withColumn("newCampusID", when(col("CampusID").isNull(), col("xCampusID")).otherwise(col("CampusID")) )

### Combine the Prep/Year 1 and Year 2 student test results

# clean up the unwanted columns

### Create growth effect table for numeracy and literacy

# groupby year and the student and get post score - pre score
NumeracyPivot_df = EarlyYearsResultsTotalsCombined_df.groupby("SKResultID", "Ceider").pivot("TestLevel").agg({"NumeracyTotal": "first"})

display(NumeracyPivot_df)

NumeracyDiff_df = NumeracyPivot_df.withColumn("Numeracydiff", col("Post") - col("Pre")).select("SKResultID", "Ceider", "NumeracyDiff")

# same thing for literacy
LiteracyPivot_df = EarlyYearsResultsTotalsCombined_df.groupby("SKResultID", "Ceider").pivot("TestLevel").agg({"LiteracyTotal": "first"})

LiteracyDiff_df = LiteracyPivot_df.withColumn("Literacydiff", col("Post") - col("Pre")).select("SKResultID", "Ceider", "LiteracyDiff")

JoinedResultDiff_df = NumeracyDiff_df.join(LiteracyDiff_df, ['SKResultID', 'Ceider'], 'inner')

# same again for the standard deviation values
StdDevNumeracyPivot_df = EarlyYearsResultsTotalsCombined_df.groupby("SKResultID", "Ceider").pivot("TestLevel").agg({"NumeracyStdDev": "first"})
StdDevNumeracyDiff_df = StdDevNumeracyPivot_df.withColumn("NumeracyStdDevAverage", ((col("Post") + col("Pre")) / 2)).select("SKResultID", "Ceider", "NumeracyStdDevAverage")

StdDevLiteracyPivot_df = EarlyYearsResultsTotalsCombined_df.groupby("SKResultID", "Ceider").pivot("TestLevel").agg({"LiteracyStdDev": "first"})
StdDevLiteracyDiff_df = StdDevLiteracyPivot_df.withColumn("LiteracyStdDevAverage", ((col("Post") + col("Pre")) / 2)).select("SKResultID", "Ceider", "LiteracyStdDevAverage")

JoinedStdDevDiff_df = StdDevNumeracyDiff_df.join(StdDevLiteracyDiff_df, ['SKResultID', 'Ceider'], 'inner')

growth_df = JoinedResultDiff_df.join(JoinedStdDevDiff_df, ['SKResultID', 'Ceider'], 'inner')

growth_df = growth_df.withColumn("NumeracyGrowthValue", col('NumeracyDiff')/col('NumeracyStdDevAverage'))
growth_df = growth_df.withColumn("LiteracyGrowthValue", col('LiteracyDiff')/col('LiteracyStdDevAverage'))
growth_df = growth_df.select('SKResultID', 'Ceider', 'NumeracyGrowthValue', 'LiteracyGrowthValue')
### Senior Outcomes transformation

# create a new SAT Column (SBA) that provides counts instead of codes. 
# Codes in the file are N - None, A - Apprenticeship, T - Traineeship

SeniorOutcomes_df = SeniorOutcomes_df.withColumn("SBA", when(SeniorOutcomes_df.sat == "N", lit(0)).otherwise(lit(1)))


# Add GenderSifCode and AtsiSifId so we can connect this table to the filter tables 
SeniorOutcomes_df = SeniorOutcomes_df.withColumn("GenderSifCode", when(SeniorOutcomes_df.sex == "F", "2")
                                                                .when(SeniorOutcomes_df.sex == "M", "1")
                                                                .otherwise("9")
                                                )


SeniorOutcomes_df = SeniorOutcomes_df.withColumn("AtsiSifId", when(SeniorOutcomes_df.indigenous == "A", "1")
                                                            .when(SeniorOutcomes_df.indigenous == "T", "2")
                                                            .when(SeniorOutcomes_df.indigenous == "B", "3")
                                                            .when(SeniorOutcomes_df.indigenous == "N", "4")
                                                            .otherwise("9")
                                                )


# replace the school column with CampusID - so we can connect to the school table

select distinct 

	year(current_date) as Year
	, replace(YearLevel, '0', 'P') as YearLevel
	, activity.CampusId as CampusID
	, campus.SchoolNameAndArea
	, ManagingCompassPersonId as TeacherID
	, concat(staffdemo.TeacherFirstName, ' ', staffdemo.TeacherLastName) as TeacherName
	, students.StudentCompassPersonId as StudentID
	, concat(studentdemo.FirstName, ' ', studentdemo.LastName) as StudentName
	, enrolment.ActivityName as ClassName
	, enrolment.ActivityCode as ClassID
	, trim(coalesce(staffemail.TeacherOrganisationUserEmail, staffdemo.TeacherEmailAddress)) as StaffEmail
	, trim(studentemail.OrganisationUserEmail) as StudentEmail
	, studentdemo.GovCode1 as Ceider


from

-- Student Organisation Milestones
(select distinct CompassPersonId as StudentCompassPersonId, YearLevel, OrganisationName, CampusId
  from vw_CompassODSStudentOrganisationMilestones
  where 1=1
  and IsActive = 'True'
  and IsCurrent = 'True'
  and IsCurrentMilestone = 'True'
  and DioceseId = 12
  and (YearLevel = '0' or YearLevel = '1' or YearLevel = '2')
) students

left join

-- Compass Activity Enrolment
(select distinct CompassPersonId as StudentCompassPersonId, ActivityCode, ActivityName, CampusID
	from vw_CompassODSActivityEnrolment
	where 1=1
	and IsCurrent = 'True'
	and RoleDescription = 'Student'
	and ActivityName <> 'Sickbay'
	and SubjectCode IS NOT NULL
	and year(ActivityEnrolmentStartDate) = year(current_date)
	and (ActivityCode like '%GEN%' or ActivityCode like 'PREP%')
) enrolment

on students.StudentCompassPersonId = enrolment.StudentCompassPersonId

left join

-- Compass Activity
(select distinct ManagingCompassPersonId, ActivityCode, SubjectCode, CampusId
	from vw_CompassODSActivity
	where 1=1
	and IsCurrent = 'True'
	and year(StartDateTime) = year(current_date)
) activity

on enrolment.ActivityCode = activity.ActivityCode
and enrolment.CampusID = activity.CampusId

inner join

-- Staff Organisation Milestones
(select distinct CompassPersonId as StaffCompassPersonId, OrganisationName
	from vw_CompassODSStaffOrganisationMilestones
	where 1=1
	and DioceseId = 12
	and IsCurrentMilestone = 'True'
	and Iscurrent = 'True'
	and IsActive = 'True'
) staffmilestone

on activity.ManagingCompassPersonId = staffmilestone.StaffCompassPersonId

inner join

-- Staff Demographic
-- only getting the personal email here because some schools have accidentally 
-- put the org user email in this field in compass
(select distinct CompassPersonId as StaffCompassPersonId, FirstName as TeacherFirstName, LastName as TeacherLastName, EmailAddress as TeacherEmailAddress
	from vw_CompassODSStaffDemographic
	where 1=1
	and IsCurrent = 'True'
) staffdemo

on staffmilestone.StaffCompassPersonId = staffdemo.StaffCompassPersonId

inner join

-- Staff Organisation Details (email)
(select distinct CompassPersonId as TeacherCompassPersonId, OrganisationUserEmail as TeacherOrganisationUserEmail, OrganisationName
	from vw_CompassODSStaffOrganisationDetails
	where 1=1
	and Iscurrent = 'True'
	and OrganisationUserEmail NOT LIKE '%supply%'
) staffemail

on staffmilestone.StaffCompassPersonId = staffemail.TeacherCompassPersonId
and staffmilestone.OrganisationName = staffemail.OrganisationName

-- compare the subdomain values from the OrganisationName and Teacher email 
-- SQL Version
--and staffemail.TeacherOrganisationUserEmail like concat('%', (select value from string_split(students.OrganisationName, '-', 1) where ordinal = 1), '%')

-- Spark SQL
--and staffemail.TeacherOrganisationUserEmail like concat('%', (select split(students.OrganisationName, '-')[0] as orgname), '%')
and staffemail.TeacherOrganisationUserEmail like concat('%', students.OrganisationName, '%')



inner join -- inner join will remove students without demographic information

-- Student Demographic
(select distinct CompassPersonId as StudentCompassPersonId, FirstName, LastName, GovCode1
	from vw_CompassODSStudentDemographic
	where 1=1
	and Iscurrent = 'True'
) studentdemo

on students.StudentCompassPersonId = studentdemo.StudentCompassPersonId

inner join  -- inner join will remove students without email

-- Student Organisation Details (Email)
(select distinct CompassPersonId as StudentCompassPersonId, OrganisationUserEmail, OrganisationName
	from vw_CompassODSStudentOrganisationDetails
	where 1=1
	and Iscurrent = 'True'
	and OrganisationUserEmail IS NOT NULL --these are all duplicate students that have emails in other records
) studentemail

on studentdemo.StudentCompassPersonId = studentemail.StudentCompassPersonId
and students.OrganisationName = studentemail.OrganisationName

left join

-- Get the School Names
(select SchoolId, SchoolNameAndArea
	from vw_dmcampus
) campus

on campus.SchoolId = activity.CampusId

def DMFactPATResults_pseudo(df):

    sourcep = oea.stage2p

    df.createOrReplaceTempView('vw_df_dmfactpatresults_pseudo')

    datedetails_df = spark.read.load(sourcep + "/ACER/DMPATStudentTestGrouping_pseudo", format='delta')

    datedetails_df.createOrReplaceTempView('vw_df_dmpatstudenttestgrouping')

    final_df = spark.sql("select a.*, concat(b.datecomplete, ' ', right(left(b.timecomplete, 10), 8)) as combineddatetime from vw_df_dmfactpatresults_pseudo a left join vw_df_dmpatstudenttestgrouping b on a.skpatstudenttestgrouping = b.skpatstudenttestgrouping inner join (select skyear, skacerstudent, skpattest, skcampus, scalescore, datecomplete, timecomplete, combineddatetime, max(skpatresults) as maxskpatresults from (select a.skpatresults, a.skyear, a.skacerstudent, a.skpattest, a.skcampus,  a.ScaleScore,  b.datecomplete, b.timecomplete, concat(b.datecomplete, ' ', right(left(b.timecomplete, 10), 8)) as combineddatetime from vw_df_dmfactpatresults_pseudo a left join vw_df_dmpatstudenttestgrouping b on a.skpatstudenttestgrouping = b.skpatstudenttestgrouping inner join (select skyear, skacerstudent, skpattest, skcampus, combineddatetime, max(scalescore) as maxscalescore from (select a.skyear, a.skacerstudent, a.skpattest, a.skcampus,  a.ScaleScore,  b.datecomplete, b.timecomplete, concat(b.datecomplete, ' ', right(left(b.timecomplete, 10), 8)) as combineddatetime from vw_df_dmfactpatresults_pseudo a left join vw_df_dmpatstudenttestgrouping b on a.skpatstudenttestgrouping = b.skpatstudenttestgrouping inner join (select skyear, skacerstudent, skpattest, skcampus, max(concat(datecomplete, ' ', right(left(timecomplete, 10), 8))) as latestdate from (select a.*, orig.skpatstudenttestgrouping, orig.skacerstanine, ScaleScore, skpatresults, b.datecomplete, b.timecomplete, concat(b.datecomplete, ' ', right(left(b.timecomplete, 10), 8)) as combineddatetime from (select skyear, skacerstudent, skpattest, skcampus, count(*) as counttotal from vw_df_dmfactpatresults_pseudo where skpattest not in (43, 54, 65, 66, 76, 79, 92, 93, 94, 95, 96, 97, 98, 99, 100, 103, 104, 105, 106, 107, 108, 109, 110, 111, 112) group by skyear, skacerstudent, skpattest, skcampus) a left join vw_df_dmfactpatresults_pseudo orig on a.skyear = orig.skyear and a.skacerstudent = orig.skacerstudent and a.skpattest = orig.skpattest and a.skcampus = orig.skcampus left join vw_df_dmpatstudenttestgrouping b on orig.skpatstudenttestgrouping = b.skpatstudenttestgrouping) total group by skyear, skacerstudent, skpattest, skcampus) inner1 on a.skyear = inner1.skyear and a.skacerstudent = inner1.SKACERStudent and a.SKPATTest = inner1.SKPATTest and a.SKCampus = inner1.SKCampus and concat(b.datecomplete, ' ', right(left(b.timecomplete, 10), 8)) = inner1.latestdate ) inner2 group by skyear, skacerstudent, skpattest, skcampus, combineddatetime ) inner3 on a.skyear = inner3.skyear and a.skacerstudent = inner3.SKACERStudent and a.SKPATTest = inner3.SKPATTest and a.SKCampus = inner3.SKCampus and concat(b.datecomplete, ' ', right(left(b.timecomplete, 10), 8)) = inner3.combineddatetime ) inner4 group by skyear, skacerstudent, skpattest, skcampus, scalescore, datecomplete, timecomplete, combineddatetime ) inner5 on a.skyear = inner5.skyear and a.skacerstudent = inner5.SKACERStudent and a.SKPATTest = inner5.SKPATTest and a.SKCampus = inner5.SKCampus and concat(b.datecomplete, ' ', right(left(b.timecomplete, 10), 8)) = inner5.combineddatetime and a.SKPATResults = inner5.maxskpatresults")

    return final_df

SELECT SchoolID AS SchoolAGEID,
    LocationID AS LocationAGEID,
    c.CampusSuburbAndName,
    pd.FirstName,
    pd.LastName,
    yl.YearLevelSifDesc AS YearLevel,
    rg.RollGroupDesc AS RollGroup,
    pd.Ceider,
    pd.SKPerson

FROM vw_factpersonmilestone f
JOIN vw_dmpersondemographic pd ON f.SKPerson = pd.SKPerson
JOIN vw_dmcampus c ON f.SKCampus = c.SKCampus
JOIN vw_dmyearlevel yl ON f.SKYearLevel = yl.SKYearLevel
JOIN vw_dmrollgroup rg ON f.SKRollGroup = rg.SKRollGroup
WHERE f.IsCurrentMilestone = 'True'
    AND f.IsActiveMilestone = 'True'
    AND pd.PersonType = 'Student'
ORDER BY SchoolAGEID, yl.YearLevelSifDesc, pd.FirstName, pd.LastName

SELECT cy.Year AS CalendarYear,
    C.SchoolId AS AGEID,
    c.CampusSuburbAndName,
    student.FirstName  AS  StudentFirstName,
    student.LastName AS StudentLastName,
    Student.Ceider,
    yl.YearLevelSifDesc AS YearLevel,
    s.SubjectShortName AS Subject,
    a.ActivityName AS  ClassName,
    a.ActivityCode AS ClassCode,
    ClassStartDate.date AS ClassStartDate,
    ClassEndDate.date AS ClassEndDate,
    staff.FirstName AS StaffFirstName,
    staff.LastName AS StaffLastName,
    c.CompassSchoolURL

    FROM vw_factsubjectenrolment f
    JOIN vw_dmactivity a ON f.SKActivity = a.SKActivity
    AND a.ActivityTypeDescription = 'Standard Class'
    JOIN vw_dmsubject s ON f.SKSubject = s.SKSubject
    JOIN vw_dmpersondemographic student ON f.SKStudent = student.SKPerson
    JOIN vw_dmpersondemographic staff ON f.SKStaff = staff.SKPerson
    JOIN vw_dmyearlevel yl ON f.SKYearLevel = yl.SKYearLevel
    JOIN vw_dmcampus c ON f.SKCampus = c.SKCampus
    JOIN vw_dmdate ClassStartDate ON f.SKEnrolmentStartDate = ClassStartDate.SKDate

    JOIN vw_dmdate ClassEndDate ON f.SKEnrolmentEndDate = ClassEndDate.SKDate
    JOIN vw_dmcalendaryear cy ON f.SKYear = cy.SKYear

    AND cy.Year = 2022
    --WHERE ClassEndDate.date > date_format('1/10/2022', 'd/mm/yyyy') --current_date() -- spark sql uses current_date() instead of GETDATE()
    --AND s.SubjectShortName <> 'Unknown'
    ORDER BY
    AGEID, YearLevel, StudentFirstName, StudentLastName,Ceider

SELECT SchoolID AS SchoolAGEID,
    LocationID AS LocationAGEID,
    c.CampusSuburbAndName,
    pd.FirstName,
    pd.LastName,
    yl.YearLevelSifDesc AS YearLevel,
    rg.RollGroupDesc AS RollGroup,
    pd.Ceider,
    d.date AS DateLeft
FROM
    vw_factpersonmilestone f
JOIN vw_dmdate d ON f.SKMilestoneStartDate = d.SKDate
JOIN vw_dmpersondemographic pd ON f.SKPerson = pd.SKPerson
JOIN vw_dmcampus c ON f.SKCampus = c.SKCampus
JOIN vw_dmyearlevel yl ON f.SKYearLevel = yl.SKYearLevel
JOIN vw_dmrollgroup rg ON f.SKRollGroup = rg.SKRollGroup

WHERE 
    f.IsCurrentMilestone = 'True'
    AND f.IsActiveMilestone = 'False'
    AND pd.PersonType = 'Student'
    AND Date < current_date()
ORDER BY SchoolAGEID,yl.YearLevelSifDesc, pd.FirstName,pd.LastName

final_df.show(truncate=False)

CREATE TEMP VIEW vw_ae_manual_learningtasks_check_nulls
as

select 
m.School_Name
,m.Area
,m.Semester
,m.Year
,m.SubjectName
,m.Code
,m.TeacherImportIdentifier
,m.TaskId
,m.IsSubjectWide
,m.TaskName
,m.StudentCode
,m.GovtCode1
,m.StudentLastName
,m.StudentFirstName
,m.YearLevel
--,case when m.YearLevel is null then m.YearLevel else concat('Year ' , cast(m.YearLevel as string)) end
--,case when m.YearLevel is null then -1 else m.YearLevel end as YearLevelNew
,m.ResultType
,m.PrimaryGrade
,m.CommentTimestamp
,m.CommentPosterCode
,m.CommentPosterName
,m.Result
,m.ComponentName
,m.ComponentType
,m.IsIncludedInReport
,m.ReportCycleName
,m.DueDate
,m.Category
,m.SubmissionStatus
,m.ReceiptTime
,m.BKID
,innerquery.ceider
from vw_aemanuallearningtasks m

left join 
(
    select a.ceider, a.firstname, a.lastname, a.persontype, b.skcampus, c.schoolname, b.skyearlevel, d.yearlevelsifdesc, d.businessdesc, d.yearlevelsifcode
    --, concat(lower(a.firstname), lower(a.lastname), lower(c.schoolname), lower(d.businessdesc)) as joinkey
    from vw_dmpersondemographic a 
    left join vw_factpersonmilestone b on a.ceider = b.ceider
    left join vw_dmcampus c on b.skcampus = c.skcampus
    left join vw_dmyearlevel d on b.skyearlevel = d.skyearlevel
    where a.persontype = 'Student'
        and b.iscurrentmilestone = 'True'
) innerquery

on lower(m.studentfirstname) = lower(innerquery.firstname)
and lower(m.studentlastname) = lower(innerquery.lastname)
and lower(m.school_name) = lower(innerquery.schoolname)
--and trim(m.yearlevel) = trim(innerquery.yearlevelsifcode)
and trim(case when m.YearLevel is null then -1 else m.YearLevel end) = trim(innerquery.yearlevelsifcode)


where m.result in ('A', 'A+', 'A-', 'B', 'B+', 'B-', 'C', 'C+', 'C-', 'D', 'D+', 'D-', 'E', 'E+', 'N')

--and m.studentfirstname = 'Rebecca' and m.studentlastname = 'VERNON'

-- CREATE TEMP VIEW vw_naplanparticipation
-- as
select 
*
--, round(cast(#naplan_enrolled as float) / cast(#students_enrolled as float), 2) as participation_perc 
, round(naplan_enrolled / students_enrolled , 2) as participation_perc 
from 
(select 
a.skcampus
, a.skyear
, a.skyearlevel
, sum(studentcount) as students_enrolled
, innerquery.naplan_enrolled from vw_factstudentenrolmentcounts a
left join vw_dmdate b on a.skdate = b.skdate
left join 
	(select 
		skcampus
		, skyear
		, skyearlevel
		, count(distinct skpersistentstudentid) as naplan_enrolled 
		from vw_factnaplanstudentyearresult
			group by skcampus, skyear, skyearlevel) innerquery
on a.skcampus = innerquery.skcampus and a.skyear = innerquery.skyear and a.skyearlevel = innerquery.skyearlevel
where a.skyearlevel in (11, 2, 12, 3) 
and b.MonthNumberOfYear = 5

--and a.skcampus = 1489 and a.skyear = 85 and a.skyearlevel = 3 
and a.skcampus = 9948 and a.skyear = 92 and a.skyearlevel = 2 
--and a.skyear = 92

group by a.skcampus, a.skyear, a.skyearlevel, innerquery.naplan_enrolled
) wholequery
--order by skcampus, skyear, skyearlevel

select a.*, b.skdate, b.MonthNumberOfYear from vw_factstudentenrolmentcounts a
left join vw_dmdate b on a.skdate = b.skdate
--where a.skcampus = 1489 and a.skyear = 85 and a.skyearlevel = 3 
where a.skcampus = 9948 and a.skyear = 92 and a.skyearlevel = 2 
and b.MonthNumberOfYear = 5

select 
		skcampus
		, skyear
		, skyearlevel
        , sknaplanassessmentid
		, count(distinct skpersistentstudentid) as naplan_enrolled 
		from vw_factnaplanstudentyearresult

        where 
        --skcampus = 1489 and skyear = 85 and skyearlevel = 3
        skcampus = 9948 and skyear = 92 and skyearlevel = 2  
        and skpersistentstudentid <> -1

			group by skcampus, skyear, skyearlevel, sknaplanassessmentid

select 
count(*)
		from vw_factnaplanstudentyearresult

        --where skcampus = 1489 and skyear = 85 and skyearlevel = 3 
        where skcampus = 9948 and skyear = 92 and skyearlevel = 2 
        and skpersistentstudentid <> -1

CREATE TEMP VIEW vw_ae_manual_learningtasks_2
as

select 
m.School_Name
,m.Area
,m.Semester
,m.Year
,m.SubjectName
,m.Code
,m.TeacherImportIdentifier
,m.TaskId
,m.IsSubjectWide
,m.TaskName
,m.StudentCode
,m.GovtCode1
,m.StudentLastName
,m.StudentFirstName
,m.YearLevel
--,case when m.YearLevel is null then m.YearLevel else concat('Year ' , cast(m.YearLevel as string)) end
,m.ResultType
,m.PrimaryGrade
,m.CommentTimestamp
,m.CommentPosterCode
,m.CommentPosterName
,m.Result
,m.ComponentName
,m.ComponentType
,m.IsIncludedInReport
,m.ReportCycleName
,m.DueDate
,m.Category
,m.SubmissionStatus
,m.ReceiptTime
,m.BKID
,innerquery.ceider
,innerquery.schoolid
,innerquery.skcampus
from vw_aemanuallearningtasks m

left join 
(
    select a.ceider, a.firstname, a.lastname, a.persontype, b.skcampus, b.skyearlevel,  c.schoolname, c.area, c.schoolid, d.yearlevelsifdesc, d.businessdesc, d.yearlevelsifcode
    --, concat(lower(a.firstname), lower(a.lastname), lower(c.schoolname), lower(d.businessdesc)) as joinkey
    from vw_dmpersondemographic a 
    left join vw_factpersonmilestone b on a.ceider = b.ceider
    left join vw_dmcampus c on b.skcampus = c.skcampus
    left join vw_dmyearlevel d on b.skyearlevel = d.skyearlevel
    where a.persontype = 'Student'
        and b.iscurrentmilestone = 'True'
) innerquery

on lower(m.studentfirstname) = lower(innerquery.firstname)
and lower(m.studentlastname) = lower(innerquery.lastname)
and lower(m.school_name) = lower(innerquery.schoolname)
--and trim(m.yearlevel) = trim(innerquery.yearlevelsifcode)
and trim(case when m.YearLevel is null then -1 else m.YearLevel end) = trim(innerquery.yearlevelsifcode)
and lower(m.area) = lower(innerquery.area)

where m.result in ('A', 'A+', 'A-', 'B', 'B+', 'B-', 'C', 'C+', 'C-', 'D', 'D+', 'D-', 'E', 'E+', 'N')

CREATE TEMP VIEW vw_naplanparticipation
as
select 
*
--, round(cast(#naplan_enrolled as float) / cast(#students_enrolled as float), 2) as participation_perc 
, round(naplan_enrolled / students_enrolled , 2) as participation_perc 
from 
(select 
a.skcampus
, a.skyear
, a.skyearlevel
, sum(studentcount) as students_enrolled
, innerquery.naplan_enrolled from vw_factstudentenrolmentcounts a
left join vw_dmdate b on a.skdate = b.skdate
left join 
	(select 
		skcampus
		, skyear
		, skyearlevel
		, count(distinct skpersistentstudentid) as naplan_enrolled 
		from vw_factnaplanstudentyearresult
			group by skcampus, skyear, skyearlevel) innerquery
on a.skcampus = innerquery.skcampus and a.skyear = innerquery.skyear and a.skyearlevel = innerquery.skyearlevel
where a.skyearlevel in (11, 2, 12, 3) 
and b.MonthNumberOfYear = 5
group by a.skcampus, a.skyear, a.skyearlevel, innerquery.naplan_enrolled
) wholequery
--order by skcampus, skyear, skyearlevel

*

select 
*
--, round(cast(count_of_tests as float) / (cast(#students_enrolled as float) * 2), 2) as participation_perc 
, round(count_of_tests /(students_enrolled  * 2), 2) as participation_perc 
from
(
select 
	--*
	a.skcampus
	, a.skyear
	, a.skdate
	, a.skyearlevel
	, sum(studentcount) as students_enrolled
	, innerquery.count_of_tests 
from vw_factstudentenrolmentcounts a

left join 
	(	
		select innerinner.skcampus, innerinner.skyear, innerinner.skdate, innerinner.SKYearLevel, sum(acer_tests) as count_of_tests from 
			(
				select 
						skcampus
						, skyear
						, SKDate
						, skyearlevel
						, SKACERStudent
						, count(distinct skpattest) as acer_tests
						from vw_factpatresults_df
							group by skcampus, skyear, skdate, skyearlevel, SKACERStudent --9
			) innerinner
	group by innerinner.skcampus, innerinner.skyear, innerinner.skdate, innerinner.SKYearLevel
	) innerquery

on a.skcampus = innerquery.skcampus and a.skyear = innerquery.skyear and a.skdate = innerquery.skdate and a.skyearlevel = innerquery.skyearlevel 
where a.skyearlevel in (21, 11, 10, 2, 16, 12, 20, 3, 17) --ACER - year levels 2 to 10
group by a.skcampus, a.skyear, a.skdate, a.skyearlevel, innerquery.count_of_tests
) wholequery
where skcampus = 8769 and skyear = 91 and skyearlevel = 2

SELECT distinct
d.FirstName AS StudentFirstName 
,d.LastName AS StudentLastName
,d.CompassPersonId
,d.GovCode1 AS Ceider
,s.SubjectLongName
,a.SubjectCode
,a.ActivityName
,a.ActivityTypeDescription
,ae.ActivityEnrolmentStartDate
,ae.ActivityEnrolmentEndDate
,staff.FirstName +' '+ staff.LastName AS StaffName
,a.CampusId AS AGEID
,c.CampusSuburbAndName
,c.CompassSchoolURL
FROM 
vw_CompassODSStudentDemographic d 
JOIN vw_CompassODSActivityEnrolment ae 
ON d.CompassPersonId = ae.CompassPersonId
AND ae.iscurrent is True
JOIN vw_CompassODSActivity a 
ON ae.ActivityCode = a.ActivityCode
AND ae.CampusId = a.CampusId
AND a.IsCurrent is True

-- --its possible for an activity to not be linked to a subject hence the left outer join.
LEFT OUTER JOIN vw_CompassODSCompassSubject s 
ON ae.SubjectCode = s.SubjectImportIdentifier
AND a.CampusId = s.CampusId
AND s.IsCurrent is True
--AND s.AcademicYear = 2021 

-- --join to get the teacher of the class
LEFT OUTER JOIN vw_CompassODSStaffDemographic  staff 
ON staff.CompassPersonId = a.ManagingCompassPersonId 
AND staff.iscurrent is True

JOIN vw_dmcampus c ON a.CampusId = c.bkCampusId
WHERE 
d.iscurrent is True
-- AND ae.ActivityEnrolmentStartDate >= '2021-01-01'
-- AND ae.ActivityEnrolmentStartDate < '2023-01-01'
AND a.ActivityTypeDescription = 'Standard Class'

CREATE TEMP VIEW vw_activestudent
AS
SELECT SchoolID AS SchoolAGEID,
    c.CampusSuburbAndName,
    pd.FirstName,
    pd.LastName,
    yl.SKYearLevel,
    rg.RollGroupDesc AS RollGroup,
    pd.Ceider,
    pd.SKPerson, 
    pd.Disability,
    pd.ATSIId,
    pd.LBOTE

FROM vw_factpersonmilestone f
JOIN vw_dmpersondemographic pd ON f.SKPerson = pd.SKPerson
JOIN vw_dmcampus c ON f.SKCampus = c.SKCampus
JOIN vw_dmyearlevel yl ON f.SKYearLevel = yl.SKYearLevel
JOIN vw_dmrollgroup rg ON f.SKRollGroup = rg.SKRollGroup
WHERE 
    f.IsCurrentMilestone = 'True'
    AND f.IsActiveMilestone = 'True'
    AND pd.PersonType = 'Student'
ORDER BY SchoolAGEID, yl.YearLevelSifDesc, pd.FirstName, pd.LastName
select * from vw_activestudent limit 5

--Year, YearLevel, CampusID, SchoolName, TeacherID, Teacher name, StudentID, Student Name, Class name/ID

select * from 
(
SELECT
s.academicyear as Year --2023
-- ,s.subjectyearlevel as YearLevel
,yl.yearlevelsifcode as YearLevel
,staff.campusid as CampusID
,c.schoolname as SchoolName

-- ,staff.bkstaff 
,staff.compasspersonid as TeacherID
-- ,staff.firstname as TeacherFirstName
-- ,staff.lastname as TeacherLastName
,concat(staff.FirstName,' ',staff.LastName) AS TeacherName


-- ,d.bkstudent
,d.compasspersonid as StudentID
-- ,d.FirstName AS StudentFirstName 
-- ,d.LastName AS StudentLastName
,concat(d.FirstName,' ',d.LastName) AS StudentName

-- 
-- ,a.ActivityName
-- ,a.ActivityCode
-- ,a.ActivityTypeDescription
-- ,a.CampusId AS AGEID
-- ,a.ManagingCompassPersonId 
,ae.ActivityEnrolmentStartDate ----------------- if there are duplicates, need to get the latest/highest value?
-- ,ae.ActivityEnrolmentEndDate

,s.subjectshortname as ClassName
-- ,s.subjectyearlevel 
,a.SubjectCode as ClassID
-- ,d.govcode1 as ceiderfromstudent
-- ,active.ceider
-- ,active.SKYearLevel
-- ,yl.yearlevelsifcode

from vw_CompassODSStaffDemographic staff

inner join vw_CompassODSActivity a
ON staff.CompassPersonId = a.ManagingCompassPersonId 
AND a.iscurrent is True

left join vw_dmcampus c 
ON staff.CampusId = c.bkCampusId

inner JOIN vw_CompassODSActivityEnrolment ae 
ON ae.ActivityCode = a.ActivityCode
AND ae.CampusId = a.CampusId
AND ae.IsCurrent is True

inner JOIN vw_CompassODSStudentDemographic d 
ON d.CompassPersonId = ae.CompassPersonId
AND d.iscurrent is True

LEFT OUTER JOIN vw_CompassODSCompassSubject s 
ON ae.SubjectCode = s.SubjectImportIdentifier
AND a.CampusId = s.CampusId
AND s.IsCurrent is True

left join vw_activestudent active
on active.ceider = d.govcode1

left join vw_dmyearlevel yl
on active.SKYearLevel = yl.SKYearLevel

where staff.firstname = 'Chloe' and staff.lastname = 'McLaren' and staff.iscurrent is True
) innerquery

where innerquery.Year = 2021
--and innerquery.yearlevel in ('P', '1', '2')
and StudentName like '%Choveaux'

--Year, YearLevel, CampusID, SchoolName, TeacherID, Teacher name, StudentID, Student Name, Class name/ID

select 

year
, YearLevel
, CampusID
, SchoolName
, TeacherID
, TeacherName
, StudentID 
, StudentName
, max(ActivityEnrolmentStartDate)
, ClassName
, ClassID

 from 
(
SELECT
s.academicyear as Year --2023
-- ,s.subjectyearlevel as YearLevel
,yl.yearlevelsifcode as YearLevel
,staff.campusid as CampusID
,c.schoolname as SchoolName

-- ,staff.bkstaff 
,staff.compasspersonid as TeacherID
-- ,staff.firstname as TeacherFirstName
-- ,staff.lastname as TeacherLastName
,concat(staff.FirstName,' ',staff.LastName) AS TeacherName


-- ,d.bkstudent
,d.compasspersonid as StudentID
-- ,d.FirstName AS StudentFirstName 
-- ,d.LastName AS StudentLastName
,concat(d.FirstName,' ',d.LastName) AS StudentName

-- 
-- ,a.ActivityName
-- ,a.ActivityCode
-- ,a.ActivityTypeDescription
-- ,a.CampusId AS AGEID
-- ,a.ManagingCompassPersonId 
,ae.ActivityEnrolmentStartDate ----------------- if there are duplicates, need to get the latest/highest value?
-- ,ae.ActivityEnrolmentEndDate

CREATE TEMP VIEW vw_ae_manual_learningtasks
as

select 
concat('LT',row_number() OVER (ORDER BY ceider)) as idcolumn,
m.School_Name
,m.Area
,m.Semester
,m.Year
,m.SubjectName
,m.Code
,m.TeacherImportIdentifier
,m.TaskId
,m.IsSubjectWide
,m.TaskName
,m.StudentCode
,m.GovtCode1
,m.StudentLastName
,m.StudentFirstName
,m.YearLevel
--,case when m.YearLevel is null then m.YearLevel else concat('Year ' , cast(m.YearLevel as string)) end
,m.ResultType
,m.PrimaryGrade
,m.CommentTimestamp
,m.CommentPosterCode
,m.CommentPosterName
,m.Result
,m.ComponentName
,m.ComponentType
,m.IsIncludedInReport
,m.ReportCycleName
,m.DueDate
,m.Category
,m.SubmissionStatus
,m.ReceiptTime
,m.BKID
,innerquery.ceider
,innerquery.schoolid
,innerquery.skcampus
from vw_aemanuallearningtasks m

left join 
(
    select a.ceider, a.firstname, a.lastname, a.persontype, b.skcampus, b.skyearlevel,  c.schoolname, c.area, c.schoolid, d.yearlevelsifdesc, d.businessdesc, d.yearlevelsifcode
    --, concat(lower(a.firstname), lower(a.lastname), lower(c.schoolname), lower(d.businessdesc)) as joinkey
    from vw_dmpersondemographic a 
    left join vw_factpersonmilestone b on a.ceider = b.ceider
    left join vw_dmcampus c on b.skcampus = c.skcampus
    left join vw_dmyearlevel d on b.skyearlevel = d.skyearlevel
    where a.persontype = 'Student'
        and b.iscurrentmilestone = 'True'
) innerquery

on lower(m.studentfirstname) = lower(innerquery.firstname)
and lower(m.studentlastname) = lower(innerquery.lastname)
and lower(m.school_name) = lower(innerquery.schoolname)
--and trim(m.yearlevel) = trim(innerquery.yearlevelsifcode)
and trim(case when m.YearLevel is null then -1 else m.YearLevel end) = trim(innerquery.yearlevelsifcode)
and lower(m.area) = lower(innerquery.area)

where m.result in ('A', 'A+', 'A-', 'B', 'B+', 'B-', 'C', 'C+', 'C-', 'D', 'D+', 'D-', 'E', 'E+', 'N')
select idcolumn from vw_ae_manual_learningtasks where idcolumn = 'LT18518'
drop view vw_ae_manual_learningtasks

CREATE TEMP VIEW vw_ae_manual_semesterreports
as

select 
concat('SR',row_number() OVER (ORDER BY ceider)) as idcolumn,
m.* 
, innerquery.ceider
, innerquery.schoolid
, innerquery.skcampus
from vw_aemanualsemesterreports m

left join 
(
    select a.ceider, a.firstname, a.lastname, a.persontype
    ,b.skcampus
    ,c.schoolname, c.area, c.schoolid
    ,b.skyearlevel 
    ,d.yearlevelsifdesc, d.businessdesc, d.yearlevelsifcode
    --, concat(lower(a.firstname), lower(a.lastname), lower(c.schoolname), lower(d.businessdesc)) as joinkey
    from vw_dmpersondemographic a 
    left join vw_factpersonmilestone b on a.ceider = b.ceider
    left join vw_dmcampus c on b.skcampus = c.skcampus
    left join vw_dmyearlevel d on b.skyearlevel = d.skyearlevel
    where a.persontype = 'Student'
         and b.iscurrentmilestone = 'True'
) innerquery

on lower(m.studentfirstname) = trim(lower(innerquery.firstname))
and lower(m.studentlastname) = trim(lower(innerquery.lastname))
and lower(m.school_name) = lower(innerquery.schoolname)
and lower(m.area) = lower(innerquery.area)
and trim(lower(m.studentyearlevel)) = trim(lower(innerquery.yearlevelsifdesc))


where m.result in ('A', 'A+', 'A-', 'B', 'B+', 'B-', 'C', 'C+', 'C-', 'D', 'D+', 'D-', 'E', 'E+', 'N')

CREATE TEMP VIEW vw_ae_manual_combined
as

select 
concat('LT',row_number() OVER (ORDER BY ceider)) as id
, School_Name
, Area
, Semester
, Year
, trim(substring(subjectname, 3)) as SubjectName 
, code as ClassCode
, StudentCode
, GovtCode1
, StudentFirstName
, initcap(studentlastname) as StudentLastName
, CASE
    WHEN yearlevel is not null THEN concat('Year ', yearlevel)
    ELSE yearlevel
        END as YearLevel
, ResultType
, CASE
    WHEN result = 'A+' THEN 'A'
    WHEN result = 'A-' THEN 'A'
    WHEN result = 'B+' THEN 'B'
    WHEN result = 'B-' THEN 'B'
    WHEN result = 'C+' THEN 'C'
    WHEN result = 'C-' THEN 'C'
    WHEN result = 'D+' THEN 'D'
    WHEN result = 'D-' THEN 'D'
    WHEN result = 'E+' THEN 'E'
    ELSE result
        END as Result
, BKID
, ceider 
, schoolid
, skcampus

from vw_ae_manual_learningtasks 


union 


select 
concat('SR',row_number() OVER (ORDER BY ceider)) as id
, School_Name
, Area
, Semester
, Year
, subject as SubjectName 
, ClassCode
, StudentCode
, GovtCode1
, StudentFirstName
, StudentLastName
, StudentYearLevel
, AssessmentType as ResultType
, Result
, BKID
, ceider 
, schoolid
, skcampus

from vw_ae_manual_semesterreports
select count(distinct id) from vw_ae_manual_combined

CREATE TEMP VIEW vw_activestudent
AS
SELECT SchoolID AS SchoolAGEID,
    c.CampusSuburbAndName,
    pd.FirstName,
    pd.LastName,
    yl.SKYearLevel,
    rg.RollGroupDesc AS RollGroup,
    pd.Ceider,
    pd.SKPerson, 
    pd.Disability,
    pd.ATSIId,
    pd.LBOTE

FROM vw_factpersonmilestone f
JOIN vw_dmpersondemographic pd ON f.SKPerson = pd.SKPerson
JOIN vw_dmcampus c ON f.SKCampus = c.SKCampus
JOIN vw_dmyearlevel yl ON f.SKYearLevel = yl.SKYearLevel
JOIN vw_dmrollgroup rg ON f.SKRollGroup = rg.SKRollGroup
WHERE 
    f.IsCurrentMilestone = 'True'
    AND f.IsActiveMilestone = 'True'
    AND pd.PersonType = 'Student'
ORDER BY SchoolAGEID, yl.YearLevelSifDesc, pd.FirstName, pd.LastName

CREATE TEMP VIEW vw_acerparticipation
as
select 
*
--, round(cast(count_of_tests as float) / (cast(#students_enrolled as float) * 2), 2) as participation_perc 
, round(count_of_tests /(students_enrolled  * 2), 2) as participation_perc 
from
(
select 
	--*
	a.skcampus
	, a.skyear
	, a.skdate
	, a.skyearlevel
	, sum(studentcount) as students_enrolled
	, innerquery.count_of_tests 
from vw_factstudentenrolmentcounts a

left join 
	(	
		select innerinner.skcampus, innerinner.skyear, innerinner.skdate, innerinner.SKYearLevel, sum(acer_tests) as count_of_tests from 
			(
				select 
						skcampus
						, skyear
						, SKDate
						, skyearlevel
						, SKACERStudent
						, count(distinct skpattest) as acer_tests
						from vw_factpatresults_df
							group by skcampus, skyear, skdate, skyearlevel, SKACERStudent --9
			) innerinner
	group by innerinner.skcampus, innerinner.skyear, innerinner.skdate, innerinner.SKYearLevel
	) innerquery

on a.skcampus = innerquery.skcampus and a.skyear = innerquery.skyear and a.skdate = innerquery.skdate and a.skyearlevel = innerquery.skyearlevel 
where a.skyearlevel in (21, 11, 10, 2, 16, 12, 20, 3, 17) --ACER - year levels 2 to 10
group by a.skcampus, a.skyear, a.skdate, a.skyearlevel, innerquery.count_of_tests
) wholequery

%%pyspark

# setup the temp tables we need
sourcep = oea.stage2p
source3p = oea.stage3p

# used for classenrolment view
factsubjectenrolment_df = spark.read.load(sourcep + "/enrolment/DMFactSubjectEnrolment_pseudo", format='delta')

SELECT CompassPersonId,
           CampusId,
           YearLevel,
           GroupA,
           GroupB,
           GroupC,
           GroupD,
           GroupE,
           IsActive,
           IsCurrentMilestone,
           --DATE_ADD(HOUR, 10, MilestoneTimestamp) AS MilestoneStartDate,
           MilestoneTimestamp + INTERVAL 10 HOURS AS MilestoneStartDate,
           COALESCE(
                       --LEAD(DATE_ADD(HOUR, 10, MilestoneTimestamp)) 
                       LEAD(MilestoneTimestamp + INTERVAL 10 HOURS) 
                                                                            OVER (PARTITION BY CompassPersonId,
                                                                                      OrganisationName
                                                                         ORDER BY MilestoneTimestamp,
                                                                                  HomeCampusGuid
                                                                        ),
                       make_date(9999, 12, 31)
                   ) AS MilestoneFinishDate,
           OrganisationName
    FROM vw_CompassODSStudentOrganisationMilestones
    -- WHERE IsCurrent = 1
     WHERE IsCurrent is True
          AND DioceseId = 12
          and compasspersonid = 'ceb1e6d0-2cdc-49cf-8a07-4bc701841504'

-- CREATE TEMP VIEW vw_ods_studentstable_aa
-- as

select year
, yearlevel
, campusid, schoolname, studentname, ceider, gender, gendercode, indigenoustype, indigenoustypecode, disability, lbote, count(*) from

(
select 
year
, YearLevel
, CampusID
, SchoolName
, TeacherID
, TeacherName
, StudentID 
, StudentName
, ClassName
, ClassID
, StaffEmail
, StudentEmail
, ceider
,Gender
,Gendercode
,Indigenoustype
,Indigenoustypecode
,Disability
,LBOTE

from 
(

SELECT
s.academicyear as Year 
--,yl.yearlevelsifcode as YearLevel
--,staff.campusid as CampusID
--,ms.yearlevel as YearLevel
,yearlevel.yearlevel as YearLevel
,staffemails.campusid as CampusID
,c.schoolname as SchoolName
,staff.compasspersonid as TeacherID
,concat(staff.FirstName,' ',staff.LastName) AS TeacherName
,d.compasspersonid as StudentID
,concat(d.FirstName,' ',d.LastName) AS StudentName
,ae.ActivityEnrolmentStartDate 
,s.subjectshortname as ClassName
,a.SubjectCode as ClassID
,d.govcode1 as ceider
,staffemails.organisationuseremail as StaffEmail
,studentemails.organisationuseremail as StudentEmail

,d.Gender
,d.Gendercode
,d.Indigenoustype
,d.Indigenoustypecode
,d.Disability
,d.LBOTE

from vw_CompassODSStaffDemographic staff

inner join vw_CompassODSActivity a
ON staff.CompassPersonId = a.ManagingCompassPersonId 
AND a.iscurrent is True

inner JOIN vw_CompassODSActivityEnrolment ae 
ON ae.ActivityCode = a.ActivityCode
AND ae.CampusId = a.CampusId
AND ae.IsCurrent is True
--and year(utcactivityenrolmentstartdate) = year(current_date) ---------------------------------------------------------------added this for 2023

inner JOIN vw_CompassODSStudentDemographic d 
ON d.CompassPersonId = ae.CompassPersonId
AND d.iscurrent is True

LEFT OUTER JOIN vw_CompassODSCompassSubject s 
ON ae.SubjectCode = s.SubjectImportIdentifier
AND a.CampusId = s.CampusId
AND s.IsCurrent is True

-- LEFT OUTER JOIN (select SubjectImportIdentifier, CampusId, IsCurrent, AcademicYear, count(subjectshortname) from vw_CompassODSCompassSubject
-- group by SubjectImportIdentifier, CampusId, IsCurrent, AcademicYear) s 
-- ON ae.SubjectCode = s.SubjectImportIdentifier
-- AND a.CampusId = s.CampusId
-- AND s.IsCurrent is True

-- left join vw_activestudent active
-- on active.ceider = d.govcode1

-- left join vw_CompassODSStudentOrganisationMilestones ms
-- on ms.compasspersonid = d.CompassPersonId
-- and ms.iscurrent is True 
-- and ms.iscurrentmilestone is True

-- left join vw_dmyearlevel yl
-- on active.SKYearLevel = yl.SKYearLevel

-- --Login emails
left join vw_CompassODSStaffOrganisationDetails staffemails
on staff.CompassPersonId = staffemails.CompassPersonId
and staffemails.iscurrent is True
and staffemails.status = 'Active'
--and staff.campusid = staffemails.campusid

--left join vw_CompassODSStudentOrganisationDetails studentemails
inner join vw_CompassODSStudentOrganisationDetails studentemails ------------using this eliminates the ones where campusid doesn't match
on d.CompassPersonId = studentemails.CompassPersonId
and studentemails.iscurrent is True
and studentemails.status = 'Active'
--and staff.campusid = studentemails.campusid
and staffemails.campusid = studentemails.campusid


left join vw_dmcampus c 
--ON staff.CampusId = c.bkCampusId
ON staffemails.campusid = c.bkCampusId

-- CASE
--     WHEN condition1 THEN result1
--     WHEN condition2 THEN result2
--     WHEN conditionN THEN resultN
--     ELSE result
-- END;

left join (SELECT CompassPersonId,
           CampusId,
           case when YearLevel = 0 then 'P' else YearLevel end as YearLevel,
           GroupA,
           GroupB,
           GroupC,
           GroupD,
           GroupE,
           IsActive,
           IsCurrentMilestone,
           --DATE_ADD(HOUR, 10, MilestoneTimestamp) AS MilestoneStartDate,
           year(MilestoneTimestamp + INTERVAL 10 HOURS) AS MilestoneYear,
           MilestoneTimestamp + INTERVAL 10 HOURS AS MilestoneStartDate,
           COALESCE(
                       --LEAD(DATE_ADD(HOUR, 10, MilestoneTimestamp)) 
                       LEAD(MilestoneTimestamp + INTERVAL 10 HOURS) 
                                                                            OVER (PARTITION BY CompassPersonId,
                                                                                      OrganisationName
                                                                         ORDER BY MilestoneTimestamp,
                                                                                  HomeCampusGuid
                                                                        ),
                       make_date(9999, 12, 31)
                   ) AS MilestoneFinishDate,
           OrganisationName
    FROM vw_CompassODSStudentOrganisationMilestones
    -- WHERE IsCurrent = 1
     WHERE IsCurrent is True
          AND DioceseId = 12
          and yearlevel is not null
          --and compasspersonid = 'ceb1e6d0-2cdc-49cf-8a07-4bc701841504'
              ) yearlevel 
        on d.CompassPersonId = yearlevel.compasspersonid
        and yearlevel.milestoneyear = s.academicyear


where 
    staff.iscurrent is True

) mainquery

where 
--year = year(CURRENT_DATE) ---------------------------------------------------------------added this for 2023
--and ae.compasspersonid = 'ceb1e6d0-2cdc-49cf-8a07-4bc701841504' --Allira Ackers
--and 
--studentname = 'Allira Ackers'
--and 
--studentname = 'Adaline Airey'
    --studentname = 'Piper Dawes' or 
-- (studentname = 'Lacie Silver')
--and 
and year is not null
-- and classname like '%Generalist%'
-- )
) wholequery

where yearlevel is not null

group by year
, yearlevel
, campusid, schoolname, studentname, ceider, gender, gendercode, indigenoustype, indigenoustypecode, disability, lbote

select yearlevel, count(*) from vw_CompassODSStudentOrganisationMilestones 
group by yearlevel 
order by yearlevel

CREATE TEMP VIEW vw_activestudent
AS
SELECT SchoolID AS SchoolAGEID,
    c.CampusSuburbAndName,
    pd.FirstName,
    pd.LastName,
    yl.SKYearLevel,
    rg.RollGroupDesc AS RollGroup,
    pd.Ceider,
    pd.SKPerson, 
    pd.Disability,
    pd.ATSIId,
    pd.LBOTE

FROM vw_factpersonmilestone f
JOIN vw_dmpersondemographic pd ON f.SKPerson = pd.SKPerson
JOIN vw_dmcampus c ON f.SKCampus = c.SKCampus
JOIN vw_dmyearlevel yl ON f.SKYearLevel = yl.SKYearLevel
JOIN vw_dmrollgroup rg ON f.SKRollGroup = rg.SKRollGroup
WHERE 
    f.IsCurrentMilestone = 'True'
    AND f.IsActiveMilestone = 'True'
    AND pd.PersonType = 'Student'
ORDER BY SchoolAGEID, yl.YearLevelSifDesc, pd.FirstName, pd.LastName

select * from vw_activestudent 
-- where firstname = 'Allira' -- skyearlevel = 14
where firstname = 'Adaline' and lastname = 'Airey' -- skyearlevel = 14

CREATE TEMP VIEW vw_ods_earlyyearsstudents
as



select 
year
, YearLevel
, CampusID
, SchoolName
, TeacherID
, TeacherName
, StudentID 
, StudentName
, ClassName
, ClassID
, StaffEmail
, StudentEmail
, ceider

from 
(

select 

year
, YearLevel
, CampusID
, SchoolName
, TeacherID
, TeacherName
, StudentID 
, StudentName
, max(ActivityEnrolmentStartDate) as ActivityEnrolmentStartDate
, ClassName
, ClassID
, StaffEmail
, StudentEmail
, ceider

 from 
(
SELECT
s.academicyear as Year 
,yl.yearlevelsifcode as YearLevel
,staff.campusid as CampusID
,c.schoolname as SchoolName
,staff.compasspersonid as TeacherID
,concat(staff.FirstName,' ',staff.LastName) AS TeacherName
,d.compasspersonid as StudentID
,concat(d.FirstName,' ',d.LastName) AS StudentName
,ae.ActivityEnrolmentStartDate 
,s.subjectshortname as ClassName
,a.SubjectCode as ClassID
,staff.emailaddress as StaffEmail
,d.emailaddress as StudentEmail
,d.govcode1 as ceider

from vw_CompassODSStaffDemographic staff

inner join vw_CompassODSActivity a
ON staff.CompassPersonId = a.ManagingCompassPersonId 
AND a.iscurrent is True

left join vw_dmcampus c 
ON staff.CampusId = c.bkCampusId

inner JOIN vw_CompassODSActivityEnrolment ae 
ON ae.ActivityCode = a.ActivityCode
AND ae.CampusId = a.CampusId
AND ae.IsCurrent is True

inner JOIN vw_CompassODSStudentDemographic d 
ON d.CompassPersonId = ae.CompassPersonId
AND d.iscurrent is True

LEFT OUTER JOIN vw_CompassODSCompassSubject s 
ON ae.SubjectCode = s.SubjectImportIdentifier
AND a.CampusId = s.CampusId
AND s.IsCurrent is True

left join vw_activestudent active
on active.ceider = d.govcode1

left join vw_dmyearlevel yl
on active.SKYearLevel = yl.SKYearLevel

where 
    staff.iscurrent is True
) innerquery

where 
innerquery.Year >= 2021 and
innerquery.yearlevel in ('P', '1', '2') 

group by
year
, YearLevel
, CampusID
, SchoolName
, TeacherID
, TeacherName
, StudentID 
, StudentName
, ClassName
, ClassID
, StaffEmail
, StudentEmail
, ceider
) mainquery

-- CREATE TEMP VIEW vw_ods_earlyyearsstudents
-- as

select count(*) from (

select 
year
, YearLevel
, CampusID
, SchoolName
, TeacherID
, TeacherName
, StudentID 
, StudentName
, ClassName
, ClassID
, StaffEmail
, StudentEmail
, ceider
, staff_login_email
-- , student_login_email

from 
(

select 

year
, YearLevel
, CampusID
, SchoolName
, TeacherID
, TeacherName
, StudentID 
, StudentName
, max(ActivityEnrolmentStartDate) as ActivityEnrolmentStartDate
, ClassName
, ClassID
, StaffEmail
, StudentEmail
, ceider
, staff_login_email
-- , student_login_email

 from 
(
SELECT
s.academicyear as Year 
,yl.yearlevelsifcode as YearLevel
,staff.campusid as CampusID
,c.schoolname as SchoolName
,staff.compasspersonid as TeacherID
,concat(staff.FirstName,' ',staff.LastName) AS TeacherName
,d.compasspersonid as StudentID
,concat(d.FirstName,' ',d.LastName) AS StudentName
,ae.ActivityEnrolmentStartDate 
,s.subjectshortname as ClassName
,a.SubjectCode as ClassID
,staff.emailaddress as StaffEmail
,d.emailaddress as StudentEmail
,d.govcode1 as ceider
,staffemails.organisationuseremail as staff_login_email
-- ,studentemails.organisationuseremail as student_login_email

from vw_CompassODSStaffDemographic staff

left join vw_CompassODSStaffOrganisationDetails staffemails
on staff.CompassPersonId = staffemails.CompassPersonId


inner join vw_CompassODSActivity a
ON staff.CompassPersonId = a.ManagingCompassPersonId 
AND a.iscurrent is True

left join vw_dmcampus c 
ON staff.CampusId = c.bkCampusId

inner JOIN vw_CompassODSActivityEnrolment ae 
ON ae.ActivityCode = a.ActivityCode
AND ae.CampusId = a.CampusId
AND ae.IsCurrent is True

inner JOIN vw_CompassODSStudentDemographic d 
ON d.CompassPersonId = ae.CompassPersonId
AND d.iscurrent is True

LEFT OUTER JOIN vw_CompassODSCompassSubject s 
ON ae.SubjectCode = s.SubjectImportIdentifier
AND a.CampusId = s.CampusId
AND s.IsCurrent is True

left join vw_activestudent active
on active.ceider = d.govcode1

left join vw_dmyearlevel yl
on active.SKYearLevel = yl.SKYearLevel

-- --Login emails
-- left join vw_CompassODSStaffOrganisationDetails staffemails
-- on staff.CompassPersonId = staffemails.CompassPersonId

-- left join vw_CompassODSStudentOrganisationDetails studentemails
-- on d.CompassPersonId = studentemails.CompassPersonId



where 
    staff.iscurrent is True
) innerquery

where 
innerquery.Year >= 2021 and
innerquery.yearlevel in ('P', '1', '2') 

group by
year
, YearLevel
, CampusID
, SchoolName
, TeacherID
, TeacherName
, StudentID 
, StudentName
, ClassName
, ClassID
, StaffEmail
, StudentEmail
, ceider
, staff_login_email
-- , student_login_email

) mainquery

,concat(staff.FirstName,' ',staff.LastName) AS TeacherName
,d.compasspersonid as StudentID
,concat(d.FirstName,' ',d.LastName) AS StudentName
,ae.ActivityEnrolmentStartDate 
,s.subjectshortname as ClassName
,a.SubjectCode as ClassID
,staff.emailaddress as StaffEmail
,d.emailaddress as StudentEmail
,d.govcode1 as ceider
,staffemails.organisationuseremail as staff_login_email
,studentemails.organisationuseremail as student_login_email

from vw_CompassODSStaffDemographic staff

-- left join vw_CompassODSStaffOrganisationDetails staffemails
-- on staff.CompassPersonId = staffemails.CompassPersonId


inner join vw_CompassODSActivity a
ON staff.CompassPersonId = a.ManagingCompassPersonId 
AND a.iscurrent is True

left join vw_dmcampus c 
ON staff.CampusId = c.bkCampusId

inner JOIN vw_CompassODSActivityEnrolment ae 
ON ae.ActivityCode = a.ActivityCode
AND ae.CampusId = a.CampusId
AND ae.IsCurrent is True

inner JOIN vw_CompassODSStudentDemographic d 
ON d.CompassPersonId = ae.CompassPersonId
AND d.iscurrent is True

LEFT OUTER JOIN vw_CompassODSCompassSubject s 
ON ae.SubjectCode = s.SubjectImportIdentifier
AND a.CampusId = s.CampusId
AND s.IsCurrent is True

left join vw_activestudent active
on active.ceider = d.govcode1

left join vw_dmyearlevel yl
on active.SKYearLevel = yl.SKYearLevel

-- --Login emails
left join vw_CompassODSStaffOrganisationDetails staffemails
on staff.CompassPersonId = staffemails.CompassPersonId
and staffemails.iscurrent is True
and staffemails.status = 'Active'

left join vw_CompassODSStudentOrganisationDetails studentemails
on d.CompassPersonId = studentemails.CompassPersonId
and studentemails.iscurrent is True
and studentemails.status = 'Active'


where 
    staff.iscurrent is True
) innerquery

where 
innerquery.Year >= 2021 and
innerquery.yearlevel in ('P', '1', '2') 

group by
year
, YearLevel
, CampusID
, SchoolName
, TeacherID
, TeacherName
, StudentID 
, StudentName
, ClassName
, ClassID
, StaffEmail
, StudentEmail
, ceider
, staff_login_email
, student_login_email

) mainquery

CREATE TEMP VIEW vw_activestudent
AS
SELECT SchoolID AS SchoolAGEID,
    c.CampusSuburbAndName,
    pd.FirstName,
    pd.LastName,
    yl.SKYearLevel,
    rg.RollGroupDesc AS RollGroup,
    pd.Ceider,
    pd.SKPerson, 
    pd.Disability,
    pd.ATSIId,
    pd.LBOTE

FROM vw_factpersonmilestone f
JOIN vw_dmpersondemographic pd ON f.SKPerson = pd.SKPerson
JOIN vw_dmcampus c ON f.SKCampus = c.SKCampus
JOIN vw_dmyearlevel yl ON f.SKYearLevel = yl.SKYearLevel
JOIN vw_dmrollgroup rg ON f.SKRollGroup = rg.SKRollGroup
WHERE 
    f.IsCurrentMilestone = 'True'
    AND f.IsActiveMilestone = 'True'
    AND pd.PersonType = 'Student'
ORDER BY SchoolAGEID, yl.YearLevelSifDesc, pd.FirstName, pd.LastName

year

 from

,c.schoolname as SchoolName
,staff.compasspersonid as TeacherID
,concat(staff.FirstName,' ',staff.LastName) AS TeacherName

,ae.ActivityEnrolmentStartDate 
,s.subjectshortname as ClassName
,a.SubjectCode as ClassID
-- ,staff.emailaddress as StaffEmail
-- ,d.emailaddress as StudentEmail
,d.govcode1 as ceider
,staffemails.organisationuseremail as StaffEmail
,studentemails.organisationuseremail as StudentEmail

from vw_CompassODSStaffDemographic staff

AND a.iscurrent is True

left join vw_dmcampus c

inner JOIN vw_CompassODSActivityEnrolment ae

inner JOIN vw_CompassODSStudentDemographic d

left join vw_activestudent active

and studentemails.status = 'Active'

and staffemails.campusid = studentemails.campusid


where 
    staff.iscurrent is True
) innerquery

where 
innerquery.Year >= 2021 and

--for 2022

select 
year
, YearLevel
, CampusID
, SchoolName
, TeacherID
, TeacherName
, StudentID 
, StudentName
, ClassName
, ClassID
, StaffEmail
, StudentEmail
, ceider
,Gender
,Indigenoustype
,Disability
,LBOTE

from 
(

select 

year
, YearLevel
, CampusID
, SchoolName
, TeacherID
, TeacherName
, StudentID 
, StudentName
, max(ActivityEnrolmentStartDate) as ActivityEnrolmentStartDate
, ClassName
, ClassID
, StaffEmail
, StudentEmail
, ceider
,Gender
,Indigenoustype
,Disability
,LBOTE


 from 
(
SELECT
s.academicyear as Year 
,case 
    when yl.yearlevelsifcode = 12 then 11
    when yl.yearlevelsifcode = 11 then 10
    when yl.yearlevelsifcode = 10 then 9
    when yl.yearlevelsifcode = 9 then 8
    when yl.yearlevelsifcode = 8 then 7
    when yl.yearlevelsifcode = 7 then 6
    when yl.yearlevelsifcode = 6 then 5
    when yl.yearlevelsifcode = 5 then 4
    when yl.yearlevelsifcode = 4 then 3
    when yl.yearlevelsifcode = 3 then 2
    when yl.yearlevelsifcode = 2 then 1
    when yl.yearlevelsifcode = 1 then 'P'
    else yl.yearlevelsifcode end as YearLevel
,staffemails.campusid as CampusID
,c.schoolname as SchoolName
,staff.compasspersonid as TeacherID
,concat(staff.FirstName,' ',staff.LastName) AS TeacherName
,d.compasspersonid as StudentID
,concat(d.FirstName,' ',d.LastName) AS StudentName
,ae.ActivityEnrolmentStartDate 
,s.subjectshortname as ClassName
,a.SubjectCode as ClassID
,d.govcode1 as ceider
,staffemails.organisationuseremail as StaffEmail
,studentemails.organisationuseremail as StudentEmail
,d.Gender
,d.Indigenoustype
,d.Disability
,d.LBOTE

from vw_CompassODSStaffDemographic staff

inner join vw_CompassODSActivity a
ON staff.CompassPersonId = a.ManagingCompassPersonId 
AND a.iscurrent is True

inner JOIN vw_CompassODSActivityEnrolment ae 
ON ae.ActivityCode = a.ActivityCode
AND ae.CampusId = a.CampusId
AND ae.IsCurrent is True
-- and year(utcactivityenrolmentstartdate) = year(current_date)
and year(utcactivityenrolmentstartdate) = 2022

inner JOIN vw_CompassODSStudentDemographic d 
ON d.CompassPersonId = ae.CompassPersonId
AND d.iscurrent is True

LEFT OUTER JOIN vw_CompassODSCompassSubject s 
ON ae.SubjectCode = s.SubjectImportIdentifier
AND a.CampusId = s.CampusId
AND s.IsCurrent is True

left join vw_activestudent active
on active.ceider = d.govcode1

left join vw_dmyearlevel yl
on active.SKYearLevel = yl.SKYearLevel

-- --Login emails
left join vw_CompassODSStaffOrganisationDetails staffemails
on staff.CompassPersonId = staffemails.CompassPersonId
and staffemails.iscurrent is True
and staffemails.status = 'Active'
--and staff.campusid = staffemails.campusid

--left join vw_CompassODSStudentOrganisationDetails studentemails
inner join vw_CompassODSStudentOrganisationDetails studentemails ------------using this eliminates the ones where campusid doesn't match
on d.CompassPersonId = studentemails.CompassPersonId
and studentemails.iscurrent is True
and studentemails.status = 'Active'
--and staff.campusid = studentemails.campusid
and staffemails.campusid = studentemails.campusid


left join vw_dmcampus c 
ON staffemails.campusid = c.bkCampusId


where 
    staff.iscurrent is True
) innerquery

where 
innerquery.Year >= 2021 and
innerquery.yearlevel in ('P', '1', '2') 

group by
year
, YearLevel
, CampusID
, SchoolName
, TeacherID
, TeacherName
, StudentID 
, StudentName
, ClassName
, ClassID
, StaffEmail
, StudentEmail
, ceider
,Gender
,Indigenoustype
,Disability
,LBOTE


) mainquery

year

, StaffEmail

,Gender

,Indigenoustype
,Indigenoustypecode
,Disability
,LBOTE


,startdate
,startdateyear

from 
(

SELECT
s.academicyear as Year 
,yearlevel.yearlevel as YearLevel
,staffemails.campusid as CampusID
,c.schoolname as SchoolName
,staff.compasspersonid as TeacherID
,concat(staff.FirstName,' ',staff.LastName) AS TeacherName
,d.compasspersonid as StudentID
,concat(d.FirstName,' ',d.LastName) AS StudentName
,ae.ActivityEnrolmentStartDate 
,s.subjectshortname as ClassName
,a.SubjectCode as ClassID
,d.govcode1 as ceider
,staffemails.organisationuseremail as StaffEmail
,studentemails.organisationuseremail as StudentEmail

,d.Gender
,d.Gendercode
,d.Indigenoustype
,d.Indigenoustypecode
,d.Disability
,d.LBOTE

,ae.utcactivityenrolmentstartdate as startdate
,year(ae.utcactivityenrolmentstartdate) as startdateyear

from vw_CompassODSStaffDemographic staff

inner join vw_CompassODSActivity a
ON staff.CompassPersonId = a.ManagingCompassPersonId 
AND a.iscurrent is True

inner JOIN vw_CompassODSActivityEnrolment ae 
ON ae.ActivityCode = a.ActivityCode
AND ae.CampusId = a.CampusId
AND ae.IsCurrent is True

ON d.CompassPersonId = ae.CompassPersonId
AND d.iscurrent is True

LEFT OUTER JOIN vw_CompassODSCompassSubject s 
ON ae.SubjectCode = s.SubjectImportIdentifier
AND a.CampusId = s.CampusId
AND s.IsCurrent is True

left join vw_CompassODSStaffOrganisationDetails staffemails
on staff.CompassPersonId = staffemails.CompassPersonId
and staffemails.iscurrent is True
and staffemails.status = 'Active'

inner join vw_CompassODSStudentOrganisationDetails studentemails 
on d.CompassPersonId = studentemails.CompassPersonId
and studentemails.iscurrent is True
and studentemails.status = 'Active'
and staffemails.campusid = studentemails.campusid

left join vw_dmcampus c 
ON staffemails.campusid = c.bkCampusId

left join (SELECT CompassPersonId,
           CampusId,
           case when YearLevel = 0 then 'P' else YearLevel end as YearLevel,
           GroupA,
           GroupB,
           GroupC,
           GroupD,
           GroupE,
           IsActive,
           IsCurrentMilestone,
           year(MilestoneTimestamp + INTERVAL 10 HOURS) AS MilestoneYear,
           MilestoneTimestamp + INTERVAL 10 HOURS AS MilestoneStartDate,
           COALESCE(
                       LEAD(MilestoneTimestamp + INTERVAL 10 HOURS) 
                                                                            OVER (PARTITION BY CompassPersonId,
                                                                                      OrganisationName
                                                                         ORDER BY MilestoneTimestamp,
                                                                                  HomeCampusGuid
                                                                        ),
                       make_date(9999, 12, 31)
                   ) AS MilestoneFinishDate,
           OrganisationName
    FROM vw_CompassODSStudentOrganisationMilestones
     WHERE IsCurrent is True
          AND DioceseId = 12
          and yearlevel is not null
              ) yearlevel 
        on d.CompassPersonId = yearlevel.compasspersonid
        and yearlevel.milestoneyear = s.academicyear


where 
    staff.iscurrent is True

) mainquery

SELECT CompassPersonId,
           CampusId,
           --case when YearLevel = 0 then 'P' else YearLevel end as YearLevel,
           YearLevel,
           GroupA,
           GroupB,
           GroupC,
           GroupD,
           GroupE,
           IsActive,
           IsCurrentMilestone,
           year(MilestoneTimestamp + INTERVAL 10 HOURS) AS MilestoneYear,
           MilestoneTimestamp + INTERVAL 10 HOURS AS MilestoneStartDate,
           COALESCE(
                       LEAD(MilestoneTimestamp + INTERVAL 10 HOURS) 
                                                                            OVER (PARTITION BY CompassPersonId,
                                                                                      OrganisationName
                                                                         ORDER BY MilestoneTimestamp,
                                                                                  HomeCampusGuid
                                                                        ),
                       make_date(9999, 12, 31)
                   ) AS MilestoneFinishDate,
           OrganisationName
    FROM vw_CompassODSStudentOrganisationMilestones
     WHERE IsCurrent is True
          AND DioceseId = 12
          and yearlevel is not null

          order by compasspersonid
