DROP VIEW IF EXISTS vw_classenrolment;

CREATE TEMP VIEW vw_classenrolment
AS
SELECT cy.Year AS CalendarYear,
    C.SchoolId AS AGEID,
    c.CampusSuburbAndName,
    student.FirstName  AS  StudentFirstName,
    student.LastName AS StudentLastName,
    Student.Ceider,
    yl.YearLevelSifDesc AS YearLevel,
    s.SubjectShortName AS Subject,
    a.ActivityName AS  ClassName,
    a.ActivityCode AS ClassCode,
    ClassStartDate.date AS ClassStartDate,
    ClassEndDate.date AS ClassEndDate,
    staff.FirstName AS StaffFirstName,
    staff.LastName AS StaffLastName

    FROM vw_factsubjectenrolment f
    JOIN vw_dmactivity a ON f.SKActivity = a.SKActivity
    AND a.ActivityTypeDescription = 'Standard Class'
    JOIN vw_dmsubject s ON f.SKSubject = s.SKSubject
    JOIN vw_dmpersondemographic student ON f.SKStudent = student.SKPerson
    JOIN vw_dmpersondemographic staff ON f.SKStaff = staff.SKPerson
    JOIN vw_dmyearlevel yl ON f.SKYearLevel = yl.SKYearLevel
    JOIN vw_dmcampus c ON f.SKCampus = c.SKCampus
    JOIN vw_dmdate ClassStartDate ON f.SKEnrolmentStartDate = ClassStartDate.SKDate

    JOIN vw_dmdate ClassEndDate ON f.SKEnrolmentEndDate = ClassEndDate.SKDate
    JOIN vw_dmcalendaryear cy ON f.SKYear = cy.SKYear

    AND cy.Year = 2022
    WHERE ClassEndDate.date > current_date() -- spark sql uses current_date() instead of GETDATE()
    AND s.SubjectShortName <> 'Unknown'
    ORDER BY
    AGEID, YearLevel, StudentFirstName, StudentLastName,Ceider

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS vw_activestudenttemp;

-- Temporary table do not save 
CREATE TEMP VIEW vw_activestudenttemp
AS
SELECT SchoolID AS SchoolAGEID,
    c.CampusSuburbAndName,
    c.SchoolId as CampusId,
    pd.FirstName,
    pd.LastName,
    yl.SKYearLevel,
    rg.RollGroupDesc AS RollGroup,
    pd.Ceider,
    pd.SKPerson, 
    pd.Disability,
    pd.ATSIId,
    pd.LBOTE

FROM vw_factpersonmilestone f
JOIN vw_dmpersondemographic pd ON f.SKPerson = pd.SKPerson
JOIN vw_dmcampus c ON f.SKCampus = c.SKCampus
JOIN vw_dmyearlevel yl ON f.SKYearLevel = yl.SKYearLevel
JOIN vw_dmrollgroup rg ON f.SKRollGroup = rg.SKRollGroup
WHERE 
    f.IsCurrentMilestone = 'True'
    AND f.IsActiveMilestone = 'True'
    AND pd.PersonType = 'Student'
ORDER BY SchoolAGEID, yl.YearLevelSifDesc, pd.FirstName, pd.LastName

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS vw_activestudent;

-- Removes duplicates from the active student temp table above
CREATE TEMP VIEW vw_activestudent
AS
SELECT *
FROM vw_activestudenttemp
WHERE Ceider NOT IN (SELECT Ceider
                    FROM vw_activestudenttemp
                    GROUP BY Ceider
                    HAVING COUNT(Ceider) > 1)

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS vw_activestudentexceptions;

-- Gets only the duplicates from the active student temp table above so it can be used in an exceptions report 
CREATE TEMP VIEW vw_activestudentexceptions
AS
SELECT *
FROM vw_activestudenttemp
WHERE Ceider IN (SELECT Ceider
                    FROM vw_activestudenttemp
                    GROUP BY Ceider
                    HAVING COUNT(Ceider) > 1)

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS vw_inactivestudent;

-- MAY NOT REQUIRE THIS ANYMORE
CREATE TEMP VIEW vw_inactivestudent
AS
SELECT SchoolID AS SchoolAGEID,
    c.CampusSuburbAndName,
    pd.FirstName,
    pd.LastName,
    yl.YearLevelSifDesc AS YearLevel,
    rg.RollGroupDesc AS RollGroup,
    pd.Ceider,
    pd.SKPerson, 
    pd.Disability,
    pd.ATSIId,
    pd.LBOTE,
    d.date AS DateLeft
    
FROM
    vw_factpersonmilestone f
JOIN vw_dmdate d ON f.SKMilestoneStartDate = d.SKDate
JOIN vw_dmpersondemographic pd ON f.SKPerson = pd.SKPerson
JOIN vw_dmcampus c ON f.SKCampus = c.SKCampus
JOIN vw_dmyearlevel yl ON f.SKYearLevel = yl.SKYearLevel
JOIN vw_dmrollgroup rg ON f.SKRollGroup = rg.SKRollGroup

WHERE 
    f.IsCurrentMilestone = 'True'
    AND f.IsActiveMilestone = 'False'
    AND pd.PersonType = 'Student'
    AND Date < current_date()
ORDER BY SchoolAGEID,yl.YearLevelSifDesc, pd.FirstName,pd.LastName

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS vw_ods_studentclass;

CREATE TEMP VIEW vw_ods_studentclass
as

SELECT distinct
d.FirstName AS StudentFirstName 
,d.LastName AS StudentLastName
,d.CompassPersonId
,d.GovCode1 AS Ceider
,s.SubjectLongName
,a.SubjectCode
,a.ActivityName
,a.ActivityTypeDescription
,a.ManagingCompassPersonId
,staff.firstname
,staff.lastname
,ae.ActivityEnrolmentStartDate
,ae.ActivityEnrolmentEndDate
,concat(staff.FirstName,' ',staff.LastName) AS StaffName
,a.CampusId AS AGEID
,c.CampusSuburbAndName
--,c.CompassSchoolURL
,s.AcademicYear
,ae.iscurrent as IsCurrent_ActivityEnrolment
,a.IsCurrent as IsCurrent_Activity
,s.IsCurrent as IsCurrent_Subject
,staff.iscurrent as IsCurrent_Staff
,d.iscurrent as IsCurrent_Student


FROM 
vw_CompassODSStudentDemographic d 

JOIN vw_CompassODSActivityEnrolment ae 
ON d.CompassPersonId = ae.CompassPersonId

JOIN vw_CompassODSActivity a 
ON ae.ActivityCode = a.ActivityCode
AND ae.CampusId = a.CampusId

LEFT OUTER JOIN vw_CompassODSCompassSubject s 
ON ae.SubjectCode = s.SubjectImportIdentifier
AND a.CampusId = s.CampusId

LEFT outer JOIN vw_CompassODSStaffDemographic  staff 
ON staff.CompassPersonId = a.ManagingCompassPersonId 

JOIN vw_dmcampus c ON a.CampusId = c.bkCampusId
WHERE 
d.iscurrent is True
AND a.ActivityTypeDescription = 'Standard Class'

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS vw_ods_studentstable;

CREATE TEMP VIEW vw_ods_studentstable
as

select
distinct ms.CompassPersonId as MS_CompassPersonID
,demo.CompassPersonId as DEMO_CompassPersonID
,ms.yearlevel
,ms.isactive 
,ms.iscurrentmilestone 
,ms.studenttype 
,ms.dioceseId
,ms.campusid 
,camp.skcampus
,camp.BKCampusId
,camp.SchoolName
,ms.iscurrent
,demo.firstname
,demo.lastname 
--,demo.gender 
,demo.govcode1 as ceider
--,demo.disability 
--,demo.LBOTE 
--,demo.indigenoustypecode 
,ms.milestonetimestamp
,year(MilestoneTimestamp + INTERVAL 10 HOURS) AS calendaryear
from vw_CompassODSStudentOrganisationMilestones ms

left join vw_CompassODSStudentDemographic demo on ms.CompassPersonId = demo.CompassPersonId 
	and demo.Iscurrent = 'True'

left join vw_dmcampus camp on ms.campusid = camp.BKCampusId

where 
ms.iscurrent = 'True'
and ms.isactive = 'True'
--and ms.iscurrentmilestone  = 'True' --this is just for 2023 (current year)
and year(MilestoneTimestamp + INTERVAL 10 HOURS) in (2021, 2022, 2023)

	e.SubjectCode
	,e.ActivityCode
	,e.CampusID
	,e.Year
	,a.SKYearLevel
	,a.Ceider

	FROM vw_allenrolments e

	AND Year = YEAR(current_date())

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS vw_currentyearenrolments_withexclusions;

AS
SELECT DISTINCT
    ce.*
    ,subject.SubjectShortName

    FROM vw_currentyearenrolments ce
    JOIN 
    (
        SELECT DISTINCT 
            c.SubjectImportIdentifier AS SubjectCode
            ,c.Campusid
            ,c.SubjectShortName
        FROM vw_CompassODSCompassSubject c
        JOIN vw_subjectexclusionlist e
        ON c.SubjectImportIdentifier = e.SubjectCode
        AND c.SubjectShortName = e.SubjectShortName
        WHERE AcademicYear = YEAR(current_date())
        AND e.Include = 'TRUE'
    ) subject
    ON ce.SubjectCode = subject.SubjectCode
    AND ce.CampusID = subject.Campusid

### Early Years Students

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS vw_ods_earlyyearsstudents;

create temp view vw_ods_earlyyearsstudents
as

select distinct 

	year(current_date) as Year
	, replace(YearLevel, '0', 'P') as YearLevel
	, instance.CampusId as CampusID
	, campus.SchoolNameAndArea
	, ManagingCompassPersonId as TeacherID
	, concat(staffdemo.TeacherFirstName, ' ', staffdemo.TeacherLastName) as TeacherName
	, students.StudentCompassPersonId as StudentID
	, concat(studentdemo.FirstName, ' ', studentdemo.LastName) as StudentName
	, enrolment.ActivityName as ClassName
	, enrolment.ActivityCode as ClassID
	, trim(coalesce(staffemail.TeacherOrganisationUserEmail, staffdemo.TeacherEmailAddress)) as StaffEmail
	, trim(studentemail.OrganisationUserEmail) as StudentEmail
	, trim(studentdemo.GovCode1) as Ceider

from

-- Student Organisation Milestones
(select distinct CompassPersonId as StudentCompassPersonId, YearLevel, OrganisationName, CampusId
  from vw_CompassODSStudentOrganisationMilestones
  where 1=1
  and IsActive = 'True'
  and IsCurrent = 'True'
  and IsCurrentMilestone = 'True'
  and DioceseId = 12
  and (YearLevel = '0' or YearLevel = '1' or YearLevel = '2')
) students

left join

-- Compass Activity Enrolment
(select distinct CompassPersonId as StudentCompassPersonId, ActivityCode, ActivityName, CampusID
	from vw_CompassODSActivityEnrolment
	where 1=1
	and IsCurrent = 'True'
	and RoleDescription = 'Student'
	and ActivityName <> 'Sickbay'
	and SubjectCode IS NOT NULL
	and year(ActivityEnrolmentStartDate) = year(current_date)
	--and to_date(ActivityEnrolmentEndDate) > current_date
	and year(to_date(ActivityEnrolmentEndDate)) = year(current_date)
	and (ActivityCode like '%GEN%' or ActivityCode like 'PREP%')
) enrolment

on students.StudentCompassPersonId = enrolment.StudentCompassPersonId

left join

-- Compass Activity Instance
(select distinct ActivityCode, ManagingCompassPersonId, CampusId
  from vw_CompassODSActivityInstance
  where 1=1 
  and IsCurrent = 'True'
  and DioceseId = 12
  and (ActivityCode like '%GEN%' or ActivityCode like 'PREP%')
  and year(Start) = year(current_date)
  and ManagingCompassPersonId <> '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000'
) instance 

on enrolment.ActivityCode = instance.ActivityCode
and enrolment.CampusID = instance.CampusId

inner join

-- Staff Organisation Milestones
(select distinct CompassPersonId as StaffCompassPersonId, OrganisationName
	from vw_CompassODSStaffOrganisationMilestones
	where 1=1
	and DioceseId = 12
	and IsCurrentMilestone = 'True'
	and Iscurrent = 'True'
	and IsActive = 'True'
) staffmilestone

on instance.ManagingCompassPersonId = staffmilestone.StaffCompassPersonId

inner join

-- Staff Demographic
-- only getting the personal email here because some schools have accidentally 
-- put the org user email in this field in compass
(select distinct CompassPersonId as StaffCompassPersonId, FirstName as TeacherFirstName, LastName as TeacherLastName, EmailAddress as TeacherEmailAddress
	from vw_CompassODSStaffDemographic
	where 1=1
	and IsCurrent = 'True'
) staffdemo

on staffmilestone.StaffCompassPersonId = staffdemo.StaffCompassPersonId

inner join

-- Staff Organisation Details (email)
(select distinct CompassPersonId as TeacherCompassPersonId, OrganisationUserEmail as TeacherOrganisationUserEmail, OrganisationName
	from vw_CompassODSStaffOrganisationDetails
	where 1=1
	and Iscurrent = 'True'
	and OrganisationUserEmail NOT LIKE '%supply%'
) staffemail

on staffmilestone.StaffCompassPersonId = staffemail.TeacherCompassPersonId
and staffmilestone.OrganisationName = staffemail.OrganisationName
and staffemail.OrganisationName like students.OrganisationName

inner join -- inner join will remove students without demographic information

-- Student Demographic
(select distinct CompassPersonId as StudentCompassPersonId, FirstName, LastName, GovCode1
	from vw_CompassODSStudentDemographic
	where 1=1
	and Iscurrent = 'True'
) studentdemo

on students.StudentCompassPersonId = studentdemo.StudentCompassPersonId

inner join  -- inner join will remove students without email

-- Student Organisation Details (Email)
(select distinct CompassPersonId as StudentCompassPersonId, OrganisationUserEmail, OrganisationName
	from vw_CompassODSStudentOrganisationDetails
	where 1=1
	and Iscurrent = 'True'
	and OrganisationUserEmail IS NOT NULL --these are all duplicate students that have emails in other records
) studentemail

on studentdemo.StudentCompassPersonId = studentemail.StudentCompassPersonId
and students.OrganisationName = studentemail.OrganisationName

left join

-- Get the School Names
(select SchoolId, SchoolNameAndArea
	from vw_dmcampus
) campus

on campus.SchoolId = instance.CampusId

-- filter out the duplicate classid's from campusid 617
WHERE 1=1
AND NOT (instance.CampusId = 617 and enrolment.ActivityCode = 'GENP_PREP')
AND NOT (instance.CampusId = 617 and enrolment.ActivityCode = 'GEN1_Year 1')
AND NOT (instance.CampusId = 617 and enrolment.ActivityCode = 'GEN2_Year 2')

### Add Substitute Teachers from the SharePoint Online list

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS vw_ods_earlyyearsstudents_substituteteachers;

-- Manual entry of support staff (non teachers) that will be conducting tests

create temp view vw_ods_earlyyearsstudents_substituteteachers
as

select 
	Year
    ,YearLevel
    ,CampusID
    ,SchoolNameAndArea
    ,TeacherID
    ,TeacherName
    ,StudentID
    ,StudentName
    ,ClassName
    ,ClassID
    ,StaffEmail
    ,StudentEmail
    ,Ceider
    from vw_ods_earlyyearsstudents

union all

select distinct
	org.Year
	,org.YearLevel
	,org.CampusID
	,org.SchoolNameAndArea
	,new.SubTeacherCompassID as TeacherID
	,new.SubTeacherName as TeacherName
	,org.StudentID
	,org.StudentName
	,org.ClassName
	,org.ClassID
	,new.SubTeacherEmail as StaffEmail
	,org.StudentEmail
	,org.Ceider

    from vw_ods_earlyyearsstudents org

inner join

    (
    select distinct
        sub.Title as OriginalTeacherEmail
        ,coalesce(details.TeacherName, sub.AdditionalTeacherEmail, 'Substitute') as SubTeacherName
        ,details.TeacherID as SubTeacherCompassID
        ,sub.AdditionalTeacherEmail as SubTeacherEmail

        from vw_EarlyYearsSubTeachers sub
        left join
        (
        select distinct
            concat(d.FirstName, ' ', d.LastName) as TeacherName
            ,d.CompassPersonId as TeacherID
            ,coalesce(so.OrganisationUserEmail, d.EmailAddress, NULL) as StaffEmail

            from vw_CompassODSStaffDemographic d
            inner join vw_CompassODSStaffOrganisationDetails so
            on d.CompassPersonId = so.CompassPersonId
            where 1=1
            and d.Iscurrent = 'True'
            and so.Iscurrent = 'True'
        ) details

        on sub.AdditionalTeacherEmail = details.StaffEmail
    ) new

on org.StaffEmail = new.OriginalTeacherEmail
### Combine NAPLAN and NAPLAN Proficiency

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS vw_DMNAPLANTestALL;

CREATE TEMP VIEW vw_DMNAPLANTestALL AS

-- First part of the UNION
SELECT 
    NT.SKNAPLANTest AS SKNAPLANProficiencyTest,
    NT.BKNAPLANTest AS BKNAPLANProficiencyTest,
    NT.TestYear,
    NT.TestLevelCode,
    NT.Domain

FROM vw_naplantest AS NT

UNION

-- Second part of the UNION
SELECT 
    PT.SKNAPLANProficiencyTest,
    PT.BKNAPLANProficiencyTest,
    PT.TestYear,
    PT.TestLevelCode,
    PT.Domain

FROM vw_naplanproficiencytest AS PT

WHERE 
    PT.SKNAPLANProficiencyTest <> -1;

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS vw_DIMNAPLANCombinedResultsStudentsActive;

CREATE TEMP VIEW vw_DIMNAPLANCombinedResultsStudentsActive AS

-- First part of the UNION
SELECT 
    TR.SKNaplanAssessmentId,
    A.Ceider,
    TR.SKYear AS NaplanSKYear,
    TR.SKYearLevel AS NaplanSKYearLevel,
    MAX(TR.ScaledScoreValue) AS NaplanScaledScoreValue,
    MAX(TR.DomainNationalAverage) AS NAPLANDomainNationalAverage

FROM vw_activestudent AS A

LEFT JOIN vw_naplanonlinestudentresult AS SR 
    ON A.Ceider = SR.PersistentIdentifier

JOIN vw_naplanonlinestudenttest AS TR 
    ON SR.SKNAPLANOnlineStudentResult = TR.SKNAPLANOnlineStudentResult

WHERE 
    TR.ScaledScoreValue IS NOT NULL

GROUP BY 
    A.Ceider, 
    TR.SKNaplanAssessmentId, 
    TR.SKYear, 
    TR.SKYearLevel

UNION

-- Second part of the UNION
SELECT 
    TR.SKNaplanAssessmentId,
    A.Ceider,
    TR.SKYear AS NaplanSKYear,
    TR.SKYearLevel AS NaplanSKYearLevel,
    MAX(TR.DomainScaledScore) AS NaplanScaledScoreValue,
    MAX(AP.MeanScale) AS NAPLANDomainNationalAverage

FROM vw_activestudent AS A

LEFT JOIN vw_naplanproficiencystudentresult AS SR 
    ON A.Ceider = SR.PersistentIdentifier

JOIN vw_naplanproficiencystudenitemresponse AS TR 
    ON SR.SKNAPLANProficiencyStudentResult = TR.SKNAPLANProficiencyStudentResult

JOIN vw_naplanacaraproficiency AS AP 
    ON TR.SKYear = AP.SKYear 
    AND TR.SKYearLevel = AP.SKYearLevel 
    AND TR.SKNaplanAssessmentId = AP.SKNaplanAssessmentId

WHERE 
    TR.DomainScaledScore IS NOT NULL
    AND AP.SKStateTerritory = 12 --National Means

GROUP BY 
    A.Ceider, 
    TR.SKNaplanAssessmentId, 
    TR.SKYear, 
    TR.SKYearLevel;

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS vw_DIMNAPLANCombinedResultsLatestStudentsActive;

CREATE TEMP VIEW vw_DIMNAPLANCombinedResultsLatestStudentsActive AS

SELECT 
    CR.Ceider,
    CR.SKNaplanAssessmentId,
    MAX(CR.NaplanSKYear) AS NaplanSKYear,
    MAX(CR.NaplanSKYearLevel) AS NaplanSKYearLevel,
    MAX(CR.NaplanScaledScoreValue) AS NaplanScaledScoreValue,
    MAX(CR.NAPLANDomainNationalAverage) AS NAPLANDomainNationalAverage

FROM vw_DIMNAPLANCombinedResultsStudentsActive AS CR

GROUP BY 
    CR.Ceider,
    CR.SKNaplanAssessmentId;

%%pyspark

# now save the sql views created above
classenrolment_df = spark.read.table('vw_classenrolment')
activestudent_df = spark.read.table('vw_activestudent')

#### Create the SQL temp views from the loaded dataframes

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS vw_classenrolment;

CREATE TEMP VIEW vw_classenrolment
AS
SELECT cy.Year AS CalendarYear,
    C.SchoolId AS AGEID,
    c.CampusSuburbAndName,
    student.FirstName  AS  StudentFirstName,
    student.LastName AS StudentLastName,
    Student.Ceider,
    yl.YearLevelSifDesc AS YearLevel,
    s.SubjectShortName AS Subject,
    a.ActivityName AS  ClassName,
    a.ActivityCode AS ClassCode,
    ClassStartDate.date AS ClassStartDate,
    ClassEndDate.date AS ClassEndDate,
    staff.FirstName AS StaffFirstName,
    staff.LastName AS StaffLastName

    FROM vw_factsubjectenrolment f
    JOIN vw_dmactivity a ON f.SKActivity = a.SKActivity
    AND a.ActivityTypeDescription = 'Standard Class'
    JOIN vw_dmsubject s ON f.SKSubject = s.SKSubject
    JOIN vw_dmpersondemographic student ON f.SKStudent = student.SKPerson
    JOIN vw_dmpersondemographic staff ON f.SKStaff = staff.SKPerson
    JOIN vw_dmyearlevel yl ON f.SKYearLevel = yl.SKYearLevel
    JOIN vw_dmcampus c ON f.SKCampus = c.SKCampus
    JOIN vw_dmdate ClassStartDate ON f.SKEnrolmentStartDate = ClassStartDate.SKDate

    JOIN vw_dmdate ClassEndDate ON f.SKEnrolmentEndDate = ClassEndDate.SKDate
    JOIN vw_dmcalendaryear cy ON f.SKYear = cy.SKYear

    AND cy.Year = 2022
    WHERE ClassEndDate.date > current_date() -- spark sql uses current_date() instead of GETDATE()
    AND s.SubjectShortName <> 'Unknown'
    ORDER BY
    AGEID, YearLevel, StudentFirstName, StudentLastName,Ceider

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS vw_activestudenttemp;

-- Temporary table do not save 
CREATE TEMP VIEW vw_activestudenttemp
AS
SELECT SchoolID AS SchoolAGEID,
    c.CampusSuburbAndName,
    c.SchoolId as CampusId,
    pd.FirstName,
    pd.LastName,
    yl.SKYearLevel,
    rg.RollGroupDesc AS RollGroup,
    pd.Ceider,
    pd.SKPerson, 
    pd.Disability,
    pd.ATSIId,
    pd.LBOTE

FROM vw_factpersonmilestone f
JOIN vw_dmpersondemographic pd ON f.SKPerson = pd.SKPerson
JOIN vw_dmcampus c ON f.SKCampus = c.SKCampus
JOIN vw_dmyearlevel yl ON f.SKYearLevel = yl.SKYearLevel
JOIN vw_dmrollgroup rg ON f.SKRollGroup = rg.SKRollGroup
WHERE 
    f.IsCurrentMilestone = 'True'
    AND f.IsActiveMilestone = 'True'
    AND pd.PersonType = 'Student'
ORDER BY SchoolAGEID, yl.YearLevelSifDesc, pd.FirstName, pd.LastName

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS vw_activestudent;

-- Removes duplicates from the active student temp table above
CREATE TEMP VIEW vw_activestudent
AS
SELECT *
FROM vw_activestudenttemp
WHERE Ceider NOT IN (SELECT Ceider
                    FROM vw_activestudenttemp
                    GROUP BY Ceider
                    HAVING COUNT(Ceider) > 1)

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS vw_activestudentexceptions;

-- Gets only the duplicates from the active student temp table above so it can be used in an exceptions report 
CREATE TEMP VIEW vw_activestudentexceptions
AS
SELECT *
FROM vw_activestudenttemp
WHERE Ceider IN (SELECT Ceider
                    FROM vw_activestudenttemp
                    GROUP BY Ceider
                    HAVING COUNT(Ceider) > 1)

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS vw_inactivestudent;

-- MAY NOT REQUIRE THIS ANYMORE
CREATE TEMP VIEW vw_inactivestudent
AS
SELECT SchoolID AS SchoolAGEID,
    c.CampusSuburbAndName,
    pd.FirstName,
    pd.LastName,
    yl.YearLevelSifDesc AS YearLevel,
    rg.RollGroupDesc AS RollGroup,
    pd.Ceider,
    pd.SKPerson, 
    pd.Disability,
    pd.ATSIId,
    pd.LBOTE,
    d.date AS DateLeft
    
FROM
    vw_factpersonmilestone f
JOIN vw_dmdate d ON f.SKMilestoneStartDate = d.SKDate
JOIN vw_dmpersondemographic pd ON f.SKPerson = pd.SKPerson
JOIN vw_dmcampus c ON f.SKCampus = c.SKCampus
JOIN vw_dmyearlevel yl ON f.SKYearLevel = yl.SKYearLevel
JOIN vw_dmrollgroup rg ON f.SKRollGroup = rg.SKRollGroup

WHERE 
    f.IsCurrentMilestone = 'True'
    AND f.IsActiveMilestone = 'False'
    AND pd.PersonType = 'Student'
    AND Date < current_date()
ORDER BY SchoolAGEID,yl.YearLevelSifDesc, pd.FirstName,pd.LastName

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS vw_naplanparticipation;

CREATE TEMP VIEW vw_naplanparticipation
as
select 
*
--, round(cast(#naplan_enrolled as float) / cast(#students_enrolled as float), 2) as participation_perc 
, round(naplan_enrolled / students_enrolled , 2) as participation_perc 
from 
(select 
a.skcampus
, a.skyear
, a.skyearlevel
, sum(studentcount) as students_enrolled
, innerquery.naplan_enrolled from vw_factstudentenrolmentcounts a
left join vw_dmdate b on a.skdate = b.skdate
left join 
	(select 
		skcampus
		, skyear
		, skyearlevel
		, count(distinct skpersistentstudentid) as naplan_enrolled 
		from vw_factnaplanstudentyearresult
			group by skcampus, skyear, skyearlevel) innerquery
on a.skcampus = innerquery.skcampus and a.skyear = innerquery.skyear and a.skyearlevel = innerquery.skyearlevel
where a.skyearlevel in (11, 2, 12, 3) 
and b.MonthNumberOfYear = 5
group by a.skcampus, a.skyear, a.skyearlevel, innerquery.naplan_enrolled
) wholequery
--order by skcampus, skyear, skyearlevel

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS vw_acerparticipation;

CREATE TEMP VIEW vw_acerparticipation
as
select 
*
--, round(cast(count_of_tests as float) / (cast(#students_enrolled as float) * 2), 2) as participation_perc 
, round(count_of_tests /(students_enrolled  * 2), 2) as participation_perc 
from
(
select 
	--*
	a.skcampus
	, a.skyear
	, a.skdate
	, a.skyearlevel
	, sum(studentcount) as students_enrolled
	, innerquery.count_of_tests 
from vw_factstudentenrolmentcounts a

left join 
	(	
		select innerinner.skcampus, innerinner.skyear, innerinner.skdate, innerinner.SKYearLevel, sum(acer_tests) as count_of_tests from 
			(
				select 
						skcampus
						, skyear
						, SKDate
						, skyearlevel
						, SKACERStudent
						, count(distinct skpattest) as acer_tests
						from vw_factpatresults_df
							group by skcampus, skyear, skdate, skyearlevel, SKACERStudent --9
			) innerinner
	group by innerinner.skcampus, innerinner.skyear, innerinner.skdate, innerinner.SKYearLevel
	) innerquery

on a.skcampus = innerquery.skcampus and a.skyear = innerquery.skyear and a.skdate = innerquery.skdate and a.skyearlevel = innerquery.skyearlevel 
where a.skyearlevel in (21, 11, 10, 2, 16, 12, 20, 3, 17) --ACER - year levels 2 to 10
group by a.skcampus, a.skyear, a.skdate, a.skyearlevel, innerquery.count_of_tests
) wholequery
### REMOVE

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS vw_ae_manual_learningtasks;

CREATE TEMP VIEW vw_ae_manual_learningtasks
as

select 
m.School_Name
,m.Area
,m.Semester
,m.Year
,m.SubjectName
,m.Code
,m.TeacherImportIdentifier
,m.TaskId
,m.IsSubjectWide
,m.TaskName
,m.StudentCode
,m.GovtCode1
,m.StudentLastName
,m.StudentFirstName
,m.YearLevel
--,case when m.YearLevel is null then m.YearLevel else concat('Year ' , cast(m.YearLevel as string)) end
,m.ResultType
,m.PrimaryGrade
,m.CommentTimestamp
,m.CommentPosterCode
,m.CommentPosterName
,m.Result
,m.ComponentName
,m.ComponentType
,m.IsIncludedInReport
,m.ReportCycleName
,m.DueDate
,m.Category
,m.SubmissionStatus
,m.ReceiptTime
,m.BKID
,innerquery.ceider
,innerquery.schoolid
,innerquery.skcampus
from vw_aemanuallearningtasks m

left join 
(
    select a.ceider, a.firstname, a.lastname, a.persontype, b.skcampus, b.skyearlevel,  c.schoolname, c.area, c.schoolid, d.yearlevelsifdesc, d.businessdesc, d.yearlevelsifcode
    --, concat(lower(a.firstname), lower(a.lastname), lower(c.schoolname), lower(d.businessdesc)) as joinkey
    from vw_dmpersondemographic a 
    left join vw_factpersonmilestone b on a.ceider = b.ceider
    left join vw_dmcampus c on b.skcampus = c.skcampus
    left join vw_dmyearlevel d on b.skyearlevel = d.skyearlevel
    where a.persontype = 'Student'
        and b.iscurrentmilestone = 'True'
) innerquery

on lower(m.studentfirstname) = lower(innerquery.firstname)
and lower(m.studentlastname) = lower(innerquery.lastname)
and lower(m.school_name) = lower(innerquery.schoolname)
--and trim(m.yearlevel) = trim(innerquery.yearlevelsifcode)
and trim(case when m.YearLevel is null then -1 else m.YearLevel end) = trim(innerquery.yearlevelsifcode)
and lower(m.area) = lower(innerquery.area)

where m.result in ('A', 'A+', 'A-', 'B', 'B+', 'B-', 'C', 'C+', 'C-', 'D', 'D+', 'D-', 'E', 'E+', 'N')

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS vw_ae_manual_semesterreports;

CREATE TEMP VIEW vw_ae_manual_semesterreports
as

select 
m.* 
, innerquery.ceider
, innerquery.schoolid
, innerquery.skcampus
from vw_aemanualsemesterreports m

left join 
(
    select a.ceider, a.firstname, a.lastname, a.persontype
    ,b.skcampus
    ,c.schoolname, c.area, c.schoolid
    ,b.skyearlevel 
    ,d.yearlevelsifdesc, d.businessdesc, d.yearlevelsifcode
    --, concat(lower(a.firstname), lower(a.lastname), lower(c.schoolname), lower(d.businessdesc)) as joinkey
    from vw_dmpersondemographic a 
    left join vw_factpersonmilestone b on a.ceider = b.ceider
    left join vw_dmcampus c on b.skcampus = c.skcampus
    left join vw_dmyearlevel d on b.skyearlevel = d.skyearlevel
    where a.persontype = 'Student'
         and b.iscurrentmilestone = 'True'
) innerquery

on lower(m.studentfirstname) = trim(lower(innerquery.firstname))
and lower(m.studentlastname) = trim(lower(innerquery.lastname))
and lower(m.school_name) = lower(innerquery.schoolname)
and lower(m.area) = lower(innerquery.area)
and trim(lower(m.studentyearlevel)) = trim(lower(innerquery.yearlevelsifdesc))


where m.result in ('A', 'A+', 'A-', 'B', 'B+', 'B-', 'C', 'C+', 'C-', 'D', 'D+', 'D-', 'E', 'E+', 'N')

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS vw_ods_studentclass;

CREATE TEMP VIEW vw_ods_studentclass
as

SELECT distinct
d.FirstName AS StudentFirstName 
,d.LastName AS StudentLastName
,d.CompassPersonId
,d.GovCode1 AS Ceider
,s.SubjectLongName
,a.SubjectCode
,a.ActivityName
,a.ActivityTypeDescription
,a.ManagingCompassPersonId
,staff.firstname
,staff.lastname
,ae.ActivityEnrolmentStartDate
,ae.ActivityEnrolmentEndDate
,concat(staff.FirstName,' ',staff.LastName) AS StaffName
,a.CampusId AS AGEID
,c.CampusSuburbAndName
--,c.CompassSchoolURL
,s.AcademicYear
,ae.iscurrent as IsCurrent_ActivityEnrolment
,a.IsCurrent as IsCurrent_Activity
,s.IsCurrent as IsCurrent_Subject
,staff.iscurrent as IsCurrent_Staff
,d.iscurrent as IsCurrent_Student


FROM 
vw_CompassODSStudentDemographic d 

JOIN vw_CompassODSActivityEnrolment ae 
ON d.CompassPersonId = ae.CompassPersonId

JOIN vw_CompassODSActivity a 
ON ae.ActivityCode = a.ActivityCode
AND ae.CampusId = a.CampusId

LEFT OUTER JOIN vw_CompassODSCompassSubject s 
ON ae.SubjectCode = s.SubjectImportIdentifier
AND a.CampusId = s.CampusId

LEFT outer JOIN vw_CompassODSStaffDemographic  staff 
ON staff.CompassPersonId = a.ManagingCompassPersonId 

JOIN vw_dmcampus c ON a.CampusId = c.bkCampusId
WHERE 
d.iscurrent is True
AND a.ActivityTypeDescription = 'Standard Class'

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS vw_ods_studentstable;

CREATE TEMP VIEW vw_ods_studentstable
as

select
distinct ms.CompassPersonId as MS_CompassPersonID
,demo.CompassPersonId as DEMO_CompassPersonID
,ms.yearlevel
,ms.isactive 
,ms.iscurrentmilestone 
,ms.studenttype 
,ms.dioceseId
,ms.campusid 
,camp.skcampus
,camp.BKCampusId
,camp.SchoolName
,ms.iscurrent
,demo.firstname
,demo.lastname 
--,demo.gender 
,demo.govcode1 as ceider
--,demo.disability 
--,demo.LBOTE 
--,demo.indigenoustypecode 
,ms.milestonetimestamp
,year(MilestoneTimestamp + INTERVAL 10 HOURS) AS calendaryear
from vw_CompassODSStudentOrganisationMilestones ms

left join vw_CompassODSStudentDemographic demo on ms.CompassPersonId = demo.CompassPersonId 
	and demo.Iscurrent = 'True'

left join vw_dmcampus camp on ms.campusid = camp.BKCampusId

where 
ms.iscurrent = 'True'
and ms.isactive = 'True'
--and ms.iscurrentmilestone  = 'True' --this is just for 2023 (current year)
and year(MilestoneTimestamp + INTERVAL 10 HOURS) in (2021, 2022, 2023)
### REMOVE

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS vw_ae_manual_combined;

CREATE TEMP VIEW vw_ae_manual_combined
as

select 
concat('LT',row_number() OVER (ORDER BY ceider)) as id
, School_Name
, Area
, Semester
, Year
, trim(substring(subjectname, 3)) as SubjectName 
, code as ClassCode
, StudentCode
, GovtCode1
, StudentFirstName
, initcap(studentlastname) as StudentLastName
, CASE
    WHEN yearlevel is not null THEN concat('Year ', yearlevel)
    ELSE yearlevel
        END as YearLevel
, ResultType
, CASE
    WHEN result = 'A+' THEN 'A'
    WHEN result = 'A-' THEN 'A'
    WHEN result = 'B+' THEN 'B'
    WHEN result = 'B-' THEN 'B'
    WHEN result = 'C+' THEN 'C'
    WHEN result = 'C-' THEN 'C'
    WHEN result = 'D+' THEN 'D'
    WHEN result = 'D-' THEN 'D'
    WHEN result = 'E+' THEN 'E'
    ELSE result
        END as Result
, BKID
, ceider 
, schoolid
, skcampus

from vw_ae_manual_learningtasks 

union 

select 
concat('SR',row_number() OVER (ORDER BY ceider)) as id
, School_Name
, Area
, Semester
, Year
, subject as SubjectName 
, ClassCode
, StudentCode
, GovtCode1
, StudentFirstName
, StudentLastName
, StudentYearLevel
, AssessmentType as ResultType
, Result
, BKID
, ceider 
, schoolid
, skcampus

from vw_ae_manual_semesterreports
### Early Years Students

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS vw_ods_earlyyearsstudents;

create temp view vw_ods_earlyyearsstudents
as

select distinct 

	year(current_date) as Year
	, replace(YearLevel, '0', 'P') as YearLevel
	, instance.CampusId as CampusID
	, campus.SchoolNameAndArea
	, ManagingCompassPersonId as TeacherID
	, concat(staffdemo.TeacherFirstName, ' ', staffdemo.TeacherLastName) as TeacherName
	, students.StudentCompassPersonId as StudentID
	, concat(studentdemo.FirstName, ' ', studentdemo.LastName) as StudentName
	, enrolment.ActivityName as ClassName
	, enrolment.ActivityCode as ClassID
	, trim(coalesce(staffemail.TeacherOrganisationUserEmail, staffdemo.TeacherEmailAddress)) as StaffEmail
	, trim(studentemail.OrganisationUserEmail) as StudentEmail
	, trim(studentdemo.GovCode1) as Ceider

from

-- Student Organisation Milestones
(select distinct CompassPersonId as StudentCompassPersonId, YearLevel, OrganisationName, CampusId
  from vw_CompassODSStudentOrganisationMilestones
  where 1=1
  and IsActive = 'True'
  and IsCurrent = 'True'
  and IsCurrentMilestone = 'True'
  and DioceseId = 12
  and (YearLevel = '0' or YearLevel = '1' or YearLevel = '2')
) students

left join

-- Compass Activity Enrolment
(select distinct CompassPersonId as StudentCompassPersonId, ActivityCode, ActivityName, CampusID
	from vw_CompassODSActivityEnrolment
	where 1=1
	and IsCurrent = 'True'
	and RoleDescription = 'Student'
	and ActivityName <> 'Sickbay'
	and SubjectCode IS NOT NULL
	and year(ActivityEnrolmentStartDate) = year(current_date)
	and to_date(ActivityEnrolmentEndDate) > current_date
	and (ActivityCode like '%GEN%' or ActivityCode like 'PREP%')
) enrolment

on students.StudentCompassPersonId = enrolment.StudentCompassPersonId

left join

-- Compass Activity Instance
(select distinct ActivityCode, ManagingCompassPersonId, CampusId
  from vw_CompassODSActivityInstance
  where 1=1 
  and IsCurrent = 'True'
  and DioceseId = 12
  and (ActivityCode like '%GEN%' or ActivityCode like 'PREP%')
  and year(Start) = year(current_date)
  and ManagingCompassPersonId <> '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000'
) instance 

on enrolment.ActivityCode = instance.ActivityCode
and enrolment.CampusID = instance.CampusId

inner join

-- Staff Organisation Milestones
(select distinct CompassPersonId as StaffCompassPersonId, OrganisationName
	from vw_CompassODSStaffOrganisationMilestones
	where 1=1
	and DioceseId = 12
	and IsCurrentMilestone = 'True'
	and Iscurrent = 'True'
	and IsActive = 'True'
) staffmilestone

on instance.ManagingCompassPersonId = staffmilestone.StaffCompassPersonId

inner join

-- Staff Demographic
-- only getting the personal email here because some schools have accidentally 
-- put the org user email in this field in compass
(select distinct CompassPersonId as StaffCompassPersonId, FirstName as TeacherFirstName, LastName as TeacherLastName, EmailAddress as TeacherEmailAddress
	from vw_CompassODSStaffDemographic
	where 1=1
	and IsCurrent = 'True'
) staffdemo

on staffmilestone.StaffCompassPersonId = staffdemo.StaffCompassPersonId

inner join

-- Staff Organisation Details (email)
(select distinct CompassPersonId as TeacherCompassPersonId, OrganisationUserEmail as TeacherOrganisationUserEmail, OrganisationName
	from vw_CompassODSStaffOrganisationDetails
	where 1=1
	and Iscurrent = 'True'
	and OrganisationUserEmail NOT LIKE '%supply%'
) staffemail

on staffmilestone.StaffCompassPersonId = staffemail.TeacherCompassPersonId
and staffmilestone.OrganisationName = staffemail.OrganisationName
and staffemail.OrganisationName like students.OrganisationName

inner join -- inner join will remove students without demographic information

-- Student Demographic
(select distinct CompassPersonId as StudentCompassPersonId, FirstName, LastName, GovCode1
	from vw_CompassODSStudentDemographic
	where 1=1
	and Iscurrent = 'True'
) studentdemo

on students.StudentCompassPersonId = studentdemo.StudentCompassPersonId

inner join  -- inner join will remove students without email

-- Student Organisation Details (Email)
(select distinct CompassPersonId as StudentCompassPersonId, OrganisationUserEmail, OrganisationName
	from vw_CompassODSStudentOrganisationDetails
	where 1=1
	and Iscurrent = 'True'
	and OrganisationUserEmail IS NOT NULL --these are all duplicate students that have emails in other records
) studentemail

on studentdemo.StudentCompassPersonId = studentemail.StudentCompassPersonId
and students.OrganisationName = studentemail.OrganisationName

left join

-- Get the School Names
(select SchoolId, SchoolNameAndArea
	from vw_dmcampus
) campus

on campus.SchoolId = instance.CampusId

-- filter out the duplicate classid's from campusid 617
WHERE 1=1
AND NOT (instance.CampusId = 617 and enrolment.ActivityCode = 'GENP_PREP')
AND NOT (instance.CampusId = 617 and enrolment.ActivityCode = 'GEN1_Year 1')
AND NOT (instance.CampusId = 617 and enrolment.ActivityCode = 'GEN2_Year 2')

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS vw_ods_earlyyearsstudents_exceptions;

-- Create a student exceptions lists with students that are assigned to multiple 'General' type classes

create temp view vw_ods_earlyyearsstudents_exceptions
as

select 
    Year
    ,YearLevel
    ,CampusID
    ,SchoolNameAndArea
    ,Ceider
    ,StudentName
    ,TeacherName
    ,ClassID

from vw_ods_earlyyearsstudents

where Ceider in (

  select Ceider
  from

  (
	  select distinct year, ceider, classid
	  FROM vw_ods_earlyyearsstudents
  ) a

  group by year, ceider
  having count(*) > 1

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS vw_ods_earlyyearsstudents_cleaned;

-- Remove the students exceptions (where a student is listed multiple times)

create temp view vw_ods_earlyyearsstudents_cleaned
as

select 
    Year
    ,YearLevel
    ,CampusID
    ,SchoolNameAndArea
    ,TeacherID
    ,TeacherName
    ,StudentID
    ,StudentName
    ,ClassName
    ,ClassID
    ,StaffEmail
    ,StudentEmail
    ,Ceider

from vw_ods_earlyyearsstudents

where Ceider NOT IN (

  select Ceider
  from

  (
	  select distinct year, ceider, classid
	  FROM vw_ods_earlyyearsstudents
  ) allceiders

  group by year, ceider
  having count(*) > 1

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS vw_ods_earlyyearsstudentsclassid_cleaned;

-- create a clean student list that lists the correct classid for each student

create temp view vw_ods_earlyyearsstudentsclassid_cleaned
as

select distinct 
    Year
    ,Ceider
    ,ClassID
    ,ClassName

from vw_ods_earlyyearsstudents_cleaned

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS vw_ods_earlyyearsstudentsclassid_updated;

create temp view vw_ods_earlyyearsstudentsclassid_updated
AS

select 
    e.Year
    ,e.YearLevel
    ,e.CampusID
    ,e.SchoolNameAndArea
    ,e.TeacherID
    ,e.TeacherName
    ,e.StudentID
    ,e.StudentName
    ,eclean.ClassName
    ,eclean.ClassID
    ,e.StaffEmail
    ,e.StudentEmail
    ,e.Ceider

from vw_ods_earlyyearsstudents e
left join vw_ods_earlyyearsstudents_cleaned eclean 
on e.Year = eclean.Year
and e.Ceider = eclean.Ceider

### Add Substitute Teachers from the SharePoint Online list

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS vw_ods_earlyyearsstudents_substituteteachers;

-- Manual entry of support staff (non teachers) that will be conducting tests

create temp view vw_ods_earlyyearsstudents_substituteteachers
as

select 
	Year
    ,YearLevel
    ,CampusID
    ,SchoolNameAndArea
    ,TeacherID
    ,TeacherName
    ,StudentID
    ,StudentName
    ,ClassName
    ,ClassID
    ,StaffEmail
    ,StudentEmail
    ,Ceider
    from vw_ods_earlyyearsstudents_addedstaff

union all

select distinct
	org.Year
	,org.YearLevel
	,org.CampusID
	,org.SchoolNameAndArea
	,new.SubTeacherCompassID as TeacherID
	,new.SubTeacherName as TeacherName
	,org.StudentID
	,org.StudentName
	,org.ClassName
	,org.ClassID
	,new.SubTeacherEmail as StaffEmail
	,org.StudentEmail
	,org.Ceider

    from vw_ods_earlyyearsstudents_addedstaff org

inner join

    (
    select distinct
        sub.Title as OriginalTeacherEmail
        ,coalesce(details.TeacherName, sub.AdditionalTeacherEmail, 'Substitute') as SubTeacherName
        ,details.TeacherID as SubTeacherCompassID
        ,sub.AdditionalTeacherEmail as SubTeacherEmail

        from vw_EarlyYearsSubTeachers sub
        left join
        (
        select distinct
            concat(d.FirstName, ' ', d.LastName) as TeacherName
            ,d.CompassPersonId as TeacherID
            ,coalesce(so.OrganisationUserEmail, d.EmailAddress, NULL) as StaffEmail

            from vw_CompassODSStaffDemographic d
            inner join vw_CompassODSStaffOrganisationDetails so
            on d.CompassPersonId = so.CompassPersonId
            where 1=1
            and d.Iscurrent = 'True'
            and so.Iscurrent = 'True'
        ) details

        on sub.AdditionalTeacherEmail = details.StaffEmail
    ) new

on org.StaffEmail = new.OriginalTeacherEmail

from pyspark.sql.functions import lit, monotonically_increasing_id, trim
from pyspark.sql import DataFrame
from functools import reduce

class SeniorOutcomesManualCopy(BaseOEAModule):
    def __init__(self, source_folder, pseudonymize = True):
        BaseOEAModule.__init__(self, source_folder, pseudonymize)
        
        
    def mergeAll(self):

        root_dir = f'{self.stage1np}' #"/_SeniorData"
        studentsubjects_list = []
        vetcourses_list = []
        vetunits_list = []
        schoollevel_list = []
        studentlevel_list = []
        
        # for each file location in this manual upload directory..
        file_list = mssparkutils.fs.ls(root_dir)
        for file in file_list:
            # ignore subfolders
            if file.isDir:
                continue
                
            # .. we need to dissect the filename to get the year, and file type
            tokens = file.name.split("_")
            year = tokens[0].strip()
            folder_name = tokens[2].strip() + "_" + tokens[3].strip() + "_" + tokens[4].strip()
            
            # turn the folder name into lower case 
            folder_name = folder_name.lower()

            filename = f'{self.stage1np}/{file.name}'

            # Merge the same files types into a dataframe (5 files in total)
            if (folder_name == '1_student_subjects'):
                df = spark.read.options(header='True').csv(filename)
                
                # add the data frame to the list of dataframes
                studentsubjects_list.append(df)

            elif (folder_name == '2_vet_courses'):
                df = spark.read.options(header='True').csv(filename)
                
                # add the data frame to the list of dataframes
                vetcourses_list.append(df)

            elif (folder_name == '3_vet_units'):
                df = spark.read.options(header='True').csv(filename)
                
                # add the data frame to the list of dataframes
                vetunits_list.append(df)
            
            elif (folder_name == 'yr12_school_level'):
                df = spark.read.options(header='True').csv(filename)
                
                # add the data frame to the list of dataframes
                schoollevel_list.append(df)
            
            elif (folder_name == 'yr12_student_level'):
                df = spark.read.options(header='True').csv(filename)
                
                # add the data frame to the list of dataframes
                studentlevel_list.append(df)

            else:
                continue #skip files that don't meet the filename criteria
                

        # once we have all of the files converted to dataframes with the extra columns, we can combined them back to one df
        studentsubjects_combined_df = reduce(DataFrame.unionAll, studentsubjects_list)
        vetcourses_combined_df = reduce(DataFrame.unionAll, vetcourses_list)
        vetunits_combined_df = reduce(DataFrame.unionAll, vetunits_list)
        schoollevel_combined_df = reduce(DataFrame.unionAll, schoollevel_list)
        studentlevel_combined_df = reduce(DataFrame.unionAll, studentlevel_list)


        # add an index to the combined tables 
        studentsubjects_indexed_df = studentsubjects_combined_df.select("*").withColumn("BKID", monotonically_increasing_id())
        vetcourses_indexed_df = vetcourses_combined_df.select("*").withColumn("BKID", monotonically_increasing_id())
        vetunits_indexed_df = vetunits_combined_df.select("*").withColumn("BKID", monotonically_increasing_id())
        schoollevel_indexed_df = schoollevel_combined_df.select("*").withColumn("BKID", monotonically_increasing_id())
        studentlevel_indexed_df = studentlevel_combined_df.select("*").withColumn("BKID", monotonically_increasing_id())


        # save the csv files
        studentsubjects_indexed_df.write.option("header", True).csv(f'{self.stage1np}/StudentSubjects')
        vetcourses_indexed_df.write.option("header", True).csv(f'{self.stage1np}/VETCourses')
        vetunits_indexed_df.write.option("header", True).csv(f'{self.stage1np}/VETUnits')
        schoollevel_indexed_df.write.option("header", True).csv(f'{self.stage1np}/SchoolLevel')
        studentlevel_indexed_df.write.option("header", True).csv(f'{self.stage1np}/StudentLevel')


# instantiate the Student Outcomes Manual Data Copy with a source folder that contains all the ingested data files 
seniorcopy = SeniorOutcomesManualCopy(source_folder)

seniorcopy.mergeAll()

from pyspark.sql.functions import when, max, regexp_replace, col, concat_ws, concat, udf, lit, regexp_replace, split, upper, date_format, to_date, first
from pyspark.sql.types import StringType
from pyspark.sql.window import Window

def DMYearLevel_pseudo(df):
    # create display name
    df = df.withColumn("DisplayName", when(df.BusinessDesc == "Unknown", "")
                                        .when(df.BusinessDesc == "", "")
                                        .when(df.BusinessDesc == "Ungraded", "")
                                        .when(df.BusinessDesc == "SecondaryUngraded", "")
                                        .when(df.BusinessDesc == "PrimaryUngraded", "")
                                        .when(df.BusinessDesc == "Childcare", "")
                                        .when(df.BusinessDesc == "4yo Kindergarten", "")
                                        .when(df.BusinessDesc == "3yo Kindergarten", "")
                                        .when(df.BusinessDesc == "TwoYearsBeforeYear1", "")
                                        .when(df.BusinessDesc == "Pre-Year 1", "Prep")
                                        .when(df.BusinessDesc == "Pre-School", "Prep")
                                        .when(df.BusinessDesc == "OneYearBeforeYear1", "Prep")
                                        .otherwise(df.BusinessDesc)
                        )

    # create 'short' name 
    df = df.withColumn("ShortName", when(df.DisplayName == "", "")
                                    .when(df.DisplayName == "Prep", "P")
                                    .otherwise(split(df.DisplayName, " ")[-1])
                        )

    return df

def DMCampus_pseudo(df):
        df = df.filter(df.DioceseName == 'Townsville') \
                .filter(df.SchoolName !=  'Townsville Catholic Education Office') \
                .filter(df.SchoolName !=  'Canossa Convent School') \
                .filter(df.SchoolName !=  'St Patrick\'s College Townsville') \
                .filter(df.SchoolId != 6814)
        
        # load the school list to get the 'area' into DMCampus
        sourcep = oea.stage2p
        school_df = spark.read.load(sourcep + "/_SupportData/SchoolList_pseudo", format='delta')
        
        school_df = school_df.withColumnRenamed('SchoolId', 'xSchoolId')

        df = df.withColumnRenamed('SchoolName', 'xSchoolName')

        newdf = df.join(school_df, df.SchoolId == school_df.xSchoolId, "inner")
        
        final_df = newdf.select(col("SchoolId"), col("SchoolName"), col("Area"), col("Location"), \
                                col("Team"), col("SchoolType"), col("Boarding"), col("SMYL"), col("LastICSEA"), \
                                col("SKCampus"), col("BKCampusId"), col("CampusSuburbAndName"), col("SchoolSuburbAndName"))

        final_df = final_df.withColumn("SchoolNameAndArea", concat_ws(" - ", "SchoolName", "Area"))

        return final_df

def DMDate_pseudo(df):

    sourcep = oea.stage2p

    df.createOrReplaceTempView('vw_df_dmdate_pseudo')

    calendar_df = spark.read.load(sourcep + "/ACER/DMCalendarYear_pseudo", format='delta')

    calendar_df.createOrReplaceTempView('vw_df_calendar')

    final_df = spark.sql("select d.*, c.skyear from vw_df_dmdate_pseudo d left join vw_df_calendar c on d.year = c.year where d.year >= 2008 and d.year <= 2030")

    return final_df

def DMStudent_pseudo(df):

    sourcep = oea.stage2p

    df.createOrReplaceTempView('vw_df_dmstudent_pseudo')

    final_df = spark.sql("select * from vw_df_dmstudent_pseudo where length(bksourcestudentid) = 36")

    return final_df

def DMNAPLAN_pseudo(df):

    sourcep = oea.stage2p

    df.createOrReplaceTempView('vw_df_dmnaplan_pseudo')

    final_df = spark.sql("select * from vw_df_dmnaplan_pseudo where PersistentStudentID <> -1")

    return final_df

def DMPersonDemographic_pseudo(df):

    final_df = df.filter(df.Ceider != -1) \
                .filter( (df.PersonType == "Student") | (df.PersonType == "Staff") ) \
                .drop("UsualTransport") \
                .drop("ContactNotesBH") \
                .drop("ContactNotesAH") \
                .drop("OrganisationUserId") \
                .drop("ProgramCode") \
                .drop("Disability_YN") \
                .drop("DisabilityFundedInt") \
                .drop("ReceivesESL_YN") \
                .drop("ReceivesESLInt") \
                .drop("RequiresESL_YN") \
                .drop("RequresESLInt") \
                .drop("LBOTE_YN") \
                .drop("LBOTEInt") \
                .drop("AccessRestrictions_YN")

    return final_df

def DMFactPATResults_pseudoREMOVE(df):

    sourcep = oea.stage2p

    df.createOrReplaceTempView('vw_df_dmfactpatresults_pseudo')

    datedetails_df = spark.read.load(sourcep + "/ACER/DMPATStudentTestGrouping_pseudo", format='delta')

    datedetails_df.createOrReplaceTempView('vw_df_dmpatstudenttestgrouping')

    final_df = spark.sql("select a.*, concat(b.datecomplete, ' ', right(left(b.timecomplete, 10), 8)) as combineddatetime from vw_df_dmfactpatresults_pseudo a left join vw_df_dmpatstudenttestgrouping b on a.skpatstudenttestgrouping = b.skpatstudenttestgrouping inner join (select skyear, skacerstudent, skpattest, skcampus, scalescore, datecomplete, timecomplete, combineddatetime, max(skpatresults) as maxskpatresults from (select a.skpatresults, a.skyear, a.skacerstudent, a.skpattest, a.skcampus,  a.ScaleScore,  b.datecomplete, b.timecomplete, concat(b.datecomplete, ' ', 8)) = inner5.combineddatetime and a.SKPATResults = inner5.maxskpatresults")

    return final_df

def DMFactPATResults_pseudo(df):
    # Create a window specification for ordering rows
    window_spec = Window.partitionBy('SKYear', 'SKYearLevel', 'SKPATTest').orderBy('NormMeanScaledScore')

    df = df.withColumn('NormMeanScaledScore', when(col('NormMeanScaledScore').isNull(), first(col('NormMeanScaledScore'), ignorenulls=True).over(window_spec)).otherwise(col('NormMeanScaledScore')))

    return df

def DMPATTest_pseudo(df):
    df = df.withColumn('SummaryGroups', when(df.PATTestName == "PAT Maths 4th Edition", "Maths")
                                        .when(df.PATTestName == "PAT Maths Plus", "Maths")
                                        .when(df.PATTestName == "PAT Maths Adaptive", "Maths")
                                        .when(df.PATTestName == "PAT Reading 5th Edition", "Reading")
                                        .when(df.PATTestName == "PAT-R Comprehension", "Reading")
                                        .when(df.PATTestName == "PAT Reading Adaptive", "Reading")
                                        .otherwise("Other")
                        )
    return df

def CompassODSStudentOrganisationMilestones_pseudo(df):

    # this will get a the first substring up to the first hyphen 
    get_substring_udf = udf(lambda x: x.split("-")[0] if "-" in x else x, StringType())

    df = df.withColumn('xOrganisationName', get_substring_udf(col('OrganisationName')))
    df = df.drop('OrganisationName')
    df = df.withColumnRenamed('xOrganisationName', 'OrganisationName')

    return df
### Early Years Testing

def EarlyYearsResults_pseudo(df):

    # filter out the in-progress tests (incomplete tests)
    df = df.filter(df.Status == "Completed")

    question_columns = [item for item in df.columns if item.startswith('Ques')]

    for col in question_columns:
            df = df.withColumn(col, when(df[col] == 'Correct', lit('1'))
                                .otherwise(when(df[col] == 'Incorrect', lit('0'))
                                .otherwise(when(df[col] == 'Used structure correctly', lit('1'))
                                .otherwise(when(df[col] == 'Used structure incorrectly', lit('0'))
                                .otherwise(when(df[col] == 'Other response', lit('0')))))))
  
    # replace errors in classes
    df = df.withColumn('ClassID', regexp_replace('ClassID', 'GENP_PREP', '00GENP01'))
    df = df.withColumn('ClassID', regexp_replace('ClassID', 'GEN1_Year 1', '01GEN101'))
   
    return df

def EarlyYearsResultsYear2_pseudo(df):

    # filter out the in-progress tests (incomplete tests)
    df = df.filter(df.Status == "Completed")

    df = df.withColumn('Ques1', when(df.Ques1.substr(1,5) == 'could', lit('could good')).otherwise(df.Ques1))

    df = df.withColumn('ClassID', regexp_replace('ClassID', 'GEN2_Year 2', '02GEN201'))

    #df = df.withColumn('ClassId', when(df.Ceider == '769425243', lit('GEN2_02C')).otherwise(df.ClassID))

    return df
### Senior Outcomes

def ATAR_pseudo(df):
    df = df.withColumn("Result_Bucket", 
                        when(df.Given_Name == "No Consent", "No Consent")
                        .when(df.Given_Name == "Vocational Pathway", "Vocational Pathway")
                        .otherwise(when(df.ATAR < 30, "< 30")
                                    .when(((df.ATAR < 40) & (df.ATAR >= 30)), "39.95 - 30")
                                    .when(((df.ATAR < 50) & (df.ATAR >= 40)), "49.95 - 40")
                                    .when(((df.ATAR < 60) & (df.ATAR >= 50)), "59.95 - 50")
                                    .when(((df.ATAR < 70) & (df.ATAR >= 60)), "69.95 - 60")
                                    .when(((df.ATAR < 80) & (df.ATAR >= 70)), "79.95 - 70")
                                    .when(((df.ATAR < 90) & (df.ATAR >= 80)), "89.95 - 80")
                                    .when(df.ATAR >= 90, "99.95 - 90")
                                )
                    )

    df = df.withColumn("Order", 
                        when(df.Result_Bucket == "< 30", 8)
                        .when(df.Result_Bucket == "39.95 - 30", 7)
                        .when(df.Result_Bucket == "49.95 - 40", 6)
                        .when(df.Result_Bucket == "59.95 - 50", 5)
                        .when(df.Result_Bucket == "69.95 - 60", 4)
                        .when(df.Result_Bucket == "79.95 - 70", 3)
                        .when(df.Result_Bucket == "89.95 - 80", 2)
                        .when(df.Result_Bucket == "99.95 - 90", 1)
                        .when(df.Result_Bucket == "No Consent", 9)
                        .otherwise(10)
                    )
    
    # also create a SK ID that will connect to the senior outcomes table
    df = df.withColumn("SKShortID", upper(concat_ws("-", "SchoolId", "Year", "Family_Name", "Given_Name")))

    return df

def StudentLevel_pseudo(df):
    df = df.withColumn("CampusID", 
                        when(df.centre_code == 1591, 15370)
                        .when(df.centre_code == 1653, 17253)
                        .when(df.centre_code == 5328, 17227)
                        .when(df.centre_code == 5331, 2529)
                        .when(df.centre_code == 5373, 13492)
                        .when(df.centre_code == 5421, 17223)
                        .when(df.centre_code == 5422, 17240)
                        .when(df.centre_code == 5429, 17225)
                        .when(df.centre_code == 5434, 17247)
                        .when(df.centre_code == 7578, 550)
                    )
    
    #df = df.withColumn("FirstNameOnly", when("given_names".contains(" "), split("given_names", " ").getItem(0)).otherwise("given_names"))

    df = df.withColumn("SKLongID", upper(concat_ws("-", split("last_name", " ").getItem(0), split("given_names", " ").getItem(0), "birth_date")))

    return df

def CompassODSStudentDemographicFull_pseudo(df):
    """ create the SKLongID column for the ODS Student Demographics table """

    # clean up the data of birth column
    df = df.withColumn("DOB_YearFirstFormat", to_date(col("DateOfBirth")))

    df = df.withColumn("DOB", date_format("DOB_YearFirstFormat", "dd/MM/yyyy"))

    df = df.withColumn("SKLongID", upper(concat_ws("-", split("LastName", " ").getItem(0), split("FirstName", " ").getItem(0), "DOB")))

    df = df.drop("DOB_YearFirstFormat", "DOB")

    # filter for isCurrent records only
    df = df.filter(col("Iscurrent") == "True")

    return df

def AEResultsCombined(df):
    # create an extra column to combine year and semester into one value
    df = df.withColumn('YearSemesterValue', concat('Year', 'Semester'))
    df = df.withColumn("YearSemesterDescription", concat(df.Year, lit(" Semester "), df.Semester))

    df = df.withColumn("UniversalResult", when(df.Result == "A", "A/AP") 
                                            .when(df.Result == "B", "B/MC")
                                            .when(df.Result == "C", "C/WW")
                                            .when(df.Result == "D", "D/EX")
                                            .when(df.Result == "E", "E/BA")
                                            .when(df.Result == "AP", "A/AP")
                                            .when(df.Result == "MC", "B/MC")
                                            .when(df.Result == "WW", "C/WW")
                                            .when(df.Result == "EX", "D/EX")
                                            .when(df.Result == "BA", "E/BA")
                                            .otherwise(df.Result)
                                            
                        )

    return df
